113a1('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par gyur te/ de lta rang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par gyur/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan
113a2('bum): par gyur/ byams pa chen po dang ldan par gyur/ snying rje chen po dang ldan par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang ldan par gyur nas/ sems can rnams phung po gsum du lung
113a3('bum): bstan par gyur to/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bsam gtan
113a4('bum): bzhi bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mngon par shes pa drug mngon par mkhyen pa bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
113a5('bum): bcu bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi myi 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed pa 'gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par gyur/
113a6('bum): ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi byams pa chen po bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi snying rje chen po bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid
113a7('bum): kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad bskyed par gyur/ sems can rnams kyang sems can ma mchis par ji ltar phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
113a8('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa rnams dang sdig to myi dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po zhig yod de/ ngo bo nyid yod pa 'am/ gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor ngas sngon byang chub sems
113b1('bum): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pa rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sdig to myi dge ba'i chos rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/ bsam gtan bzhi nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par yang myi
113b2('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di 'dod pa rnams dang / sdig to myi dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid myed pa gzhan gyi dngos po myed pa ste/ gzhan du na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas/ rab 'byor de'i
113b3('bum): phyir nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam
113b4('bum): gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te/ gnas par gyur to/ /rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa myed pa dpyod pa myed pa ting 'dzin las
113b5('bum): skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to/ /dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde
113b6('bum): ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par
113b7('bum): gyur to/ /bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed/ sdug bsngal yang myed pa btang bsnyoms dang dran pas/ yongs su dag
113b8('bum): pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to/ /rab 'byor gal te mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po zhig yod de/ ngo bo nyid yod pa 'am/ gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor
114a1('bum): ngas kyang mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di ltar
114a2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po myed de/ ngo bo nyid myed pa gzhan gyi dngos po myed pa ste/ gzhan du dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
114a3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du thugs su chud de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rab 'byor kyis
114a4('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lngas/ bla na myed pa
114a5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du/ chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
114a6('bum): mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis nan tan du bgyi ba gang gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i mthar kyis spyod
114a7('bum): pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis nan tan du bgyi ba mchis par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ thog mar
114a8('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur pa'i dgra bcom pa dag dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba
114b1('bum): dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dag las/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
114b2('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa
114b3('bum): rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'phags pa thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi ngo bo nyid chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi gnas tsam yang myed do/ /zhes bya bar thos na/ byang chub
114b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ji ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang
114b5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ dgra bcom pa rnams kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid/ rgyun tu zhugs pa
114b6('bum): rnams kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/ gal te bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang rung / gal te mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang rung ste/ chos
114b7('bum): thams cad ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin gyis/ ci nas kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas te/ sems can dngos po'i 'du shes la spyod pa thams cad dngos po myed
114b8('bum): pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
115a1('bum): par 'jug ste/ mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis nan tan tu bya ba gang la bslabs shing / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed
115a2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de lta bu'i mthar kyis spyod pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis nan tan tu rtsom mo/ /de thog mar sbyin pa'i
115a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
115a4('bum): pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do/ /de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /pha rol kyang sbyin pa la rab tu gzhog go/ /sbyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/ /sems
115a5('bum): can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de sbyin pa des skyid pa chen po'i tshogs thob par 'gyur te/ skyon dang / ser sna myed pa'i sems kyis sbyin
115a6('bum): pa sbyin par bya ba dang / sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar byed de/ zas 'dod pa la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa la ni skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa la ni gos/ spos 'dod pa la ni spos/ phreng ba 'dod
115a7('bum): pa la ni phreng ba/ byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug pa/ mal ca 'dod pa la ni mal cha/ gnas 'dod pa la ni gnas/ mar mye 'dod pa la ni mar mye/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / be dur+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang
115a8('bum): gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / be dur+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang dngul yongs su gtong ba nas/ myi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba dag kyang / de dag la
115b1('bum): gtong ba'i bar du ste/ de sbyin pa de nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /lha'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do/ /myi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do/ /de sbyin pa dang tshul khrims de nyid kyis/ ting nge 'dzin kyi
115b2('bum): phung po rab tu thob par byed do/ /de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do/ /de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab de nyid kyis/ rnam par grol ba'i
115b3('bum): phung po rab tu thob par byed do/ /de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba de nyid kyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do/ /de sbyin pa dang / tshul
115b4('bum): khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de nyid kyis/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go/ /
115b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
115b6('bum): pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
115b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pas mthar kyis spyod par yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
115b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag
116a1('bum): par skul lo/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/ /gzhan gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de tshul
116a2('bum): khrims des lha'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do/ /myi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do/ /de nor myed pa'i sems can rnams la nor byin zhing / tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/ /ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do/ /shes rab
116a3('bum): la rab tu 'god do/ /rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/ /de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol
116a4('bum): ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i
116a5('bum): phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
116a6('bum): byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/
116a7('bum): sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyis mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/
116a8('bum): de thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang
116b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/ /gzhan gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi
116b2('bum): yang legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do/ /tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/ /ting nge 'dzin la
116b3('bum): rab tu 'god do/ /shes rab la rab tu 'god do/ /rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/ /de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po dang / shes rab
116b4('bum): kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po dang
116b5('bum): shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs
116b6('bum): nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor
116b7('bum): lo skor ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongs tu grol bar byed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
116b8('bum): bzod pas mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
117a1('bum): dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo/ /brtson 'grus kyi legs pa rjod do/ /gzhan gang brtson
117a2('bum): 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do/ /tshul khrims la rab
117a3('bum): tu 'god do/ /ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do/ /shes rab la rab tu 'god do/ /rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/ /de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi phung
117a4('bum): po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi phung
117a5('bum): po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par
117a6('bum): zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas nas/
117a7('bum): chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
117a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyis mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan
117b1('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang tshad myed pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par
117b2('bum): gzhog go/ /gzhan yang tshad myed pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la rab tu 'god do/ /tshad myed pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
117b3('bum): kyi legs pa rjod do/ /gzhan tshad myed pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhag pa de dag gi legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do/ /de tshad myed pa dang /
117b4('bum): bsam gtan dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la gnas shing / sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do/ /tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/ /ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do/ /shes rab
117b5('bum): la rab tu 'god do/ /rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/ /de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /
117b6('bum): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /
117b7('bum): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs
117b8('bum): su smyin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las
118a1('bum): yongs su grol bar byed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyis mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
118a2('bum): ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams sbyin pas
118a3('bum): yongs su tshim par byed do/ /tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do/ /ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do/ /shes rab la rab tu 'god do/ /rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/ /
118a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /tshul khrims srung ngo / /bzod pa sgrub po/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog go/ /shes rab sgom mo/ /
118a5('bum): gzhan yang sbyin pa la rab tu gzhog go/ /tshul khrims la rab tu gzhog go/ /bzod pa la rab tu gzhog go/ /brtson 'grus la rab tu gzhog go/ /ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gzhog go/ /shes rab la rab tu gzhog go/ /
118a6('bum): sbyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/ /tshul khrims kyi legs pa rjod do/ /bzod pa'i legs pa rjod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi legs pa rjod do/ /bsam gtan gyi legs pa rjod do/ /shes rab kyi legs pa rjod do/ /gang gzhan sbyin
118a7('bum): pa yongs su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / shes rab sgom pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas
118a8('bum): dga' bar spyod do/ /de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
118b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang thabs mkhas pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/
118b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor
118b3('bum): ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes
118b4('bum): rab kyis mthar kyis spyod pa rtsom ste/ de thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun
118b5('bum): pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa la slob ste/ de sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyi tshe
118b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed de/ de sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom mo/ /chos rjes su dran pa sgom mo/ /
118b7('bum): dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom mo/ /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom mo/ /gtong ba rjes su dran pa sgom mo/ /lha rjes su dran pa sgom mo/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas
118b8('bum): rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs su yid la myi byed/
119a1('bum): tshor bar yid la myi byed/ 'du shes su yid la myi byed/ 'du byed du yid la myi byed/ rnam par shes par yid la myi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed
119a2('bum): pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'o/ /tshor ba la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'o/ /'du shes la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'o/ /'du byed la ngo bo nyid myed de/
119a3('bum): gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa myed
119a4('bum): cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
119a5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yid la myi byed/ sku gser gyi kha dog gis yid la myid byed/ 'od 'dom gang bas yid la myi byed/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yid
119a6('bum): la myi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /sku gser gyi kha dog la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid
119a7('bum): myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /'od 'dom gang ba la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /
119a8('bum): dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po
119b1('bum): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul khrims kyi phung por yid la myi byed/ ting nge 'dzin kyi phung por yid la myi byed/ shes rab kyi phung
119b2('bum): por yid la myi byed/ rnam par grol ba'i phung por yid la myi byed/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs par yid la myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo
119b3('bum): nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /shes rab kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /rnam par
119b4('bum): grol ba'i phung po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /dngos po myed
119b5('bum): pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes
119b6('bum): su dran pa sgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yid la myi byed/ myi 'jigs pa bzhis yid la myi byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa
119b7('bum): bzhis yid la myi byed/ byams pa chen pos yid la myi byed/ snying rje chen pos yid la myi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis yid la myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
119b8('bum): bcu la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid
120a1('bum): myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /byams pa chen po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /snying rje chen po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed
120a2('bum): pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir
120a3('bum): zhe na/ dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
120a4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar yid la myi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed
120a5('bum): pa'o/ /dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
120a6('bum): po/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar na mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis
120a7('bum): 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
120a8('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
120b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
120b2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
120b3('bum): byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
120b4('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
120b5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong
120b6('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma myed
120b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa
120b8('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
121a1('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa stong pa
121a2('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs
121a3('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ yang dag par spongs pa rnams yongs su
121a4('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
121a5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed
121a6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
121a7('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i
121a8('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos
121b1('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
121b2('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
121b3('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed
121b4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo
121b5('bum): bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
121b6('bum): byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
121b7('bum): pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes
121b8('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par
122a1('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ste/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/ dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/
122a2('bum): rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung
122a3('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du gtogs par byas nas/ chos rjes su dran pa sgom
122a4('bum): na/ dge ba'i chos yid la myi byed/ myi dge ba'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'jig rten pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ zang zing dang bcas pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ zang
122a5('bum): zing myed pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'phags pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'phags pa'i ma yin pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ zag pa myed pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'dod
122a6('bum): pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ gzugs myed pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'dus byas kyi chos yid la
122a7('bum): myi byed/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos yid la myi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos de dag la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi
122a8('bum): nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni/ chos rjes su dran pa'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la/
122b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i
122b2('bum): lam yod pa yin te/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i
122b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
122b4('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
122b5('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
122b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
122b7('bum): tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
122b8('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
123a1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma myed
123a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
123a3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
123a4('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed
123a5('bum): do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos
123a6('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo
123a7('bum): bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
123a8('bum): stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i lam
123b1('bum): yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan
123b2('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
123b3('bum): 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar kyis gnas
123b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
123b5('bum): mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
123b6('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo
123b7('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi
123b8('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byams pa chen po yongs su
124a1('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su
124a2('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed
124a3('bum): do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/
124a4('bum): de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/ dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems
124a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
124a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos
124a7('bum): kyi dge 'dun tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa'i skyes bu zung bzhi dang / skyes bu gang zag brgyad po de dag dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid
124a8('bum): la byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pa la dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba
124b1('bum): myed pa ni/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa bsgom par
124b2('bum): bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
124b3('bum): po de mthar kyis spyod pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
124b4('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson
124b5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
124b6('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
124b7('bum): kyi tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su
124b8('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
125a1('bum): gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma
125a2('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
125a3('bum): byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed
125a4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
125a5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
125a6('bum): pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs
125a7('bum): par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
125a8('bum): gyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
125b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshad myed pa rnams yongs su
125b2('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs
125b3('bum): par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed
125b4('bum): do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i
125b5('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
125b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ myi
125b7('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byams pa chen
125b8('bum): po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad
126a1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su
126a2('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
126a3('bum): te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/ dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
126a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
126a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom zhing / ma ral ba ma zhig pa ma
126a6('bum): 'dres pa/ skyon myed pa/ ma nyams pa mthu dang ldan pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa/ shin tu rdzogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su sgrub pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa yin te/ de tshul khrims de dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du
126a7('bum): yid la byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do/ /gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa/ dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa myed cing /
126a8('bum): yid la bya ba myed pa ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas
126b1('bum): tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslob pa'i lam yod pa yin
126b2('bum): te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
126b3('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
126b4('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
126b5('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
126b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i
126b7('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
126b8('bum): gyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus ma
127a1('bum): byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thog ma
127a2('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
127a3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
127a4('bum): par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos
127a5('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i
127a6('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
127a7('bum): tshul gyis/ stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags
127a8('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
127b1('bum): bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
127b2('bum): 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
127b3('bum): par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtshan ma myed pa'i
127b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams
127b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par
127b6('bum): byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ myi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed
127b7('bum): do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po
127b8('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po
128a1('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed
128a2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes
128a3('bum): pa 'am/ dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
128a4('bum): gtong ba rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
128a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa sgom zhing / gang zang zing gtong ba dang / chos gtong
128a6('bum): ba yid la myi byed de/ de yan lag dang / nying lag kyang yongs su gtong na/ dngos po gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ de ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang / 'di ltar bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'o/ /dngos po 'di gtang
128a7('bum): ba'o/ /'di la gtang bar bya'o snyam du myi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dngos po de dag la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /dngos po myed pas ni dngos po
128a8('bum): myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos
128b1('bum): thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mthar kyis
128b2('bum): spyad pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab
128b3('bum): pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims
128b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus
128b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ shes rab
128b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su
128b7('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos
128b8('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
129a1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha'
129a2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
129a3('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chos thams
129a4('bum): cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa
129a5('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
129a6('bum): par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed
129a7('bum): do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed
129a8('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi
129b1('bum): yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags
129b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshad myed pa rnams yongs su
129b3('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs
129b4('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge
129b5('bum): 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
129b6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs
129b7('bum): par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par
129b8('bum): byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/
130a1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i
130a2('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed
130a3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de ni chos
130a4('bum): thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/ dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/
130a5('bum): dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
130a6('bum): chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo
130a7('bum): bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/ lha rjes su dran pa sgom ste/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skyes pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes pa dang / mtshe ma'i lhar skyes pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lhar skyes pa dang / 'phrul
130a8('bum): dga'i lhar skyes pa dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skyes pa dag dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gzugs myed pa na spyod pa'i phyir myi 'ong ba de dag dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /
130b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni/ dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran
130b2('bum): pa myed cing / yid la bya ba myed pa ni/ lha rjes su dran pa'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
130b3('bum): pa la spyod pas/ lha rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis
130b4('bum): 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
130b5('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
130b6('bum): tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
130b7('bum): tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
130b8('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
131a1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
131a2('bum): byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo
131a3('bum): bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
131a4('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
131a5('bum): kyi tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
131a6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
131a7('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po myed
131a8('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ yang dag par
131b1('bum): spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dbang po rnams yongs su
131b2('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
131b3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
131b4('bum): gyis/ bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzugs myed pa'i
131b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar kyis
131b6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
131b7('bum): mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mngon
131b8('bum): par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs
132a1('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs
132a2('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par
132a3('bum): byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos
132a4('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo
132a5('bum): bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes
132a6('bum): pa 'am/ dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
132a7('bum): sems dang po skyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod
132a8('bum): pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
132b1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
132b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
132b3('bum): par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi
132b4('bum): nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos
132b5('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus ma
132b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab
132b7('bum): par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
132b8('bum): tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ myi dmyigs pa stong
133a1('bum): pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos
133a2('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
133a3('bum): kyi tshul gyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dbang po rnams
133a4('bum): la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
133a5('bum): gyis/ lam la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po
133a6('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshad myed pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
133a7('bum): tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
133a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
133b1('bum): bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
133b2('bum): tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi
133b3('bum): la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byams pa chen po la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed
133b4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
133b5('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
133b6('bum): la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la slob pa'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/
133b7('bum): mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i
133b8('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i
134a1('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed
134a2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed
134a3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi nang
134a4('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
134a5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
134a6('bum): kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
