160b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du
160b7('bum): bya ba myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ sbyin pa gtong ba yin te/ bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / gnas dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang /
160b8('bum): gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / myi'i cha sta dang / yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag dang / chung ma dang / bu dang / bu mo 'am/ phyi dang nang ngam/
161a1('bum): yan lag dang / nying lag dang / rgyal srid yang rung / rgyan kyis brgyan cing / slong ba rnams la yongs su gtong ste/ gal te de'i drung du la la zhig 'ongs shing / 'di skad du/ khyod kyi sbyin pa de lta bur de ltar phan pa myed pa
161a2('bum): myi brtan pa yongs su btang ba des ci zhig bya zhes zer na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de 'di snyam du bdag la sems can 'di dag khyed kyi sbyin pa de ltar phan pa
161a3('bum): myed pa myi brtan pa yongs su btang ba des ci zhig bya zhes zer mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gis sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bya'i bdag gis sbyin pa myi sbyin par myi bya'o snyam nas/ de sbyin pa de sems can thams cad thun
161a4('bum): mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ ci nas kyang yongs su sngo ba'i tshe/ gang sbyin pa dang gang la sbyin pa dang / gang gis sbyin pa dang / su yongs su gtong ba dang / ci yongs
161a5('bum): su gtong ba dang / su ci yongs su gtong ba dang / ci yongs su bsngo ba dang / gang la yongs su bsngo ba dang / gang gis yongs su bsngo ba dang / su yongs su bsngo ba dang / ci yongs su bsngo ba dang / gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i
161a6('bum): mtshan ma yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ de gang gtong ba dang / gang gi phyir btang ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang dag par
161a7('bum): rjes su myi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dngos po thams cad ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /chen po stong pa nyid
161a8('bum): kyis stong ngo / /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
161b1('bum): kyis stong ngo / /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis
161b2('bum): stong ngo / /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /des de ltar chos thams cad stong par yang dag par rjes su mthong na/
161b3('bum): ji zhig yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur/ gang la yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur/ gang gis yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur te/ de'i bsngo ba de lta bu ni bsngo ba'i dam pa yin/ dug myed pa'i bsngo ba yin/ chos kyi dbyings kyi bsngo
161b4('bum): ba yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang /
161b5('bum): 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshul khrims
161b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
161b7('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid
161b8('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /'dus byas
162a1('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su
162a2('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs
162a3('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
162a4('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs
162a5('bum): par byed do/ /stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs
162a6('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ /bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams
162a7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par
162a8('bum): byed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
162b1('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /snying rje
162b2('bum): chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de thog ma nyid du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang / rnam par smyin pa yongs
162b3('bum): su myi 'dzin te/ 'on kyang de'i yo byad thams cad bsam pa tsam gyis 'grub bo/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni bsams pa tsam
162b4('bum): gyis 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung ngo / /de'i yo byad de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom
162b5('bum): ldan 'das rnams la yang bsnyen bkur byed/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang tshim par byed do/ /des sems can de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des yang dag par bsdus te/ thabs
162b6('bum): mkhas pas theg pa gsum la rab tu 'jug go/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa
162b7('bum): dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su smyin par byed do/ /rab 'byor ci ltar byang chub sems dpa'
162b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du
163a1('bum): bya ba myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
163a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par
163a3('bum): 'du bya ba myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su smyin par byed do/ /de 'phags pa'i tshul khrims zag
163a4('bum): pa myed pa lam gyi khongs su chud pa chos nyid kyis thob pa rab tu 'thob ste/ de'i tshul khrims de ni ma zhig pa yin/ ma god pa yin/ ma 'dres pa yin/ rnyog pa myed pa yin/ ma nyams pa yin/ rang
163a5('bum): dbang yod pa yin/ shin tu rdzogs pa yin/ mkhas pas bstod pa yin te/ tshul khrims des gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ myig gam/
163a6('bum): rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/
163a7('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa
163a8('bum): 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
163b1('bum): tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ mye'i khams sam/
163b2('bum): rlung gi khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ mying dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa 'am/ srid
163b3('bum): pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/
163b4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam
163b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa
163b6('bum): nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
163b7('bum): pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag
163b8('bum): rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
164a1('bum): pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ mngon par
164a2('bum): shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams
164a3('bum): pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis sam/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 'am/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs sam/
164a4('bum): bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs sam/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs sam/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams sam/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams sam/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams sam/ dga'
164a5('bum): ldan gyi lha rnams sam/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams sam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams sam/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams sam/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams sam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams
164a6('bum): sam/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams sam/ snang ba'i lha rnams sam/ chung snang gi lha rnams sam/ tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams sam/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams sam/ dge ba'i lha
164a7('bum): rnams sam/ chung dge ba'i lha rnams sam/ tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams sam/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams sam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams sam/ 'du shes myed pa'i lha rnams sam/ myi che ba'i lha
164a8('bum): rnams sam/ myi gdung ba'i lha rnams sam/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams sam/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams sam/ 'og myin gyi lha rnams sam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams sam/
164b1('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams sam/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams sam/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan
164b2('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dbang tshul khrims 'dis thob par bya'o zhes chos gang la
164b3('bum): yang snyems pa myed de/ gzhan du na tshul khrims de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mtshan ma myed pa'i yongs su bsngo ba dang / dmyigs su myed pa'i yongs su
164b4('bum): bsngo ba dang / gnyis su myed pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba ste/ de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du'i/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par de dang / thabs
164b5('bum): mkhas pa des ro myang ba myed pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi sgrub bo/ /de lha'i myig mngon par sgrub ste/ lha'i myig rnam par smyin pa las byung ba des/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs
164b6('bum): myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing mtsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ de'i mthong ba de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
164b7('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar myi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i myig rnam par smyin pa las byung ba des/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom
164b8('bum): ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ de'i mthong ba de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud
165a1('bum): za bar myi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i myig rnam par smyin pa las byung ba des/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig
165a2('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ de'i mthong ba de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar myi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i
165a3('bum): myig rnam par smyin pa las byung ba des/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos
165a4('bum): ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ de'i mthong ba de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar myi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i myig rnam par smyin pa las
165a5('bum): byung ba des/ byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston
165a6('bum): pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ de'i mthong ba de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar myi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i myig rnam par smyin pa las byung ba des/
165a7('bum): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/
165a8('bum): de'i mthong ba de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar myi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i myig rnam par smyin pa las byung ba des/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
165b1('bum): rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ de'i mthong ba de ni bla na myed
165b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar myi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i myig rnam par smyin pa las byung ba des/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
165b3('bum): tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ de'i mthong ba de ni bla na myed pa yang dag
165b4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar myi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i myig rnam par smyin pa las byung ba des/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed
165b5('bum): dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ de'i mthong ba de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
165b6('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar myi 'gyur ro/ /lha'i myig rnam par smyin pa las byung ba des/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed
165b7('bum): pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ de'i mthong ba de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
165b8('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du chud za bar myi 'gyur ro/ /myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /de ci'i phyir bzod pa zhes bya zhe na/ nyon mongs pa myi skye ba dang / ye shes myi chod
166a1('bum): pa'i phyir bzod pa ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'o/ /de bzod pa de gnyis la gnas shing / bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /gzugs myed
166a2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
166a3('bum): dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i
166a4('bum): sgo gsum yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs
166a5('bum): pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /snying rje chen po
166a6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa myed pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma
166a7('bum): yin pa de dag la gnas te/ 'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag la
166a8('bum): gnas te/ lha'i myig gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong
166b1('bum): ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob bo/ /de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du
166b2('bum): rgyun myi 'chad do/ /de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa myed pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/ 'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su
166b3('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ /mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ lha'i myig gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas
166b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob
166b5('bum): bo/ /de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun myi 'chad do/ /de 'phags pa'i chos zag
166b6('bum): pa myed pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/ 'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
166b7('bum): mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ lha'i myig gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
166b8('bum): 'das gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob bo/ /de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam
167a1('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun myi 'chad do/ /de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa myed pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang /
167a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/ 'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug
167a3('bum): la gnas te/ lha'i myig gis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de
167a4('bum): dag thams cad mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob bo/ /de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
167a5('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun myi 'chad do/ /de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa myed pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas
167a6('bum): te/ de 'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ lha'i myig gis byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams
167a7('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ sangs rgyas
167a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob bo/ /de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar
167b1('bum): du rgyun myi 'chad do/ /de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa myed pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/ de 'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa
167b2('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ lha'i myig gis shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed
167b3('bum): dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ sangs rgyas rjes
167b4('bum): su dran pa thob bo/ /de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun myi 'chad do/ /de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa myed
167b5('bum): pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/ de 'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mngon par shes pa
167b6('bum): de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ lha'i myig gis lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
167b7('bum): 'das gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob bo/ /de'i sangs rgyas
167b8('bum): rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun myi 'chad do/ /de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa myed pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan
168a1('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/ de 'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/ pha rol
168a2('bum): tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ lha'i myig gis nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /
168a3('bum): chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob bo/ /de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
168a4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun myi 'chad do/ /de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa myed pa 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/ de 'phags
168a5('bum): pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mngon par shes pa de dag yongs su rdzogs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ lha'i myig gis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed
168a6('bum): dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ sangs rgyas rjes
168a7('bum): su dran pa thob bo/ /de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun myi 'chad do/ /de 'phags pa'i chos zag pa myed pa
168a8('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de dag la gnas te/ de 'phags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mngon par shes pa de dag
168b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ lha'i myig gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ci snyed cig bzhugs shing
168b2('bum): 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob bo/ /de'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de yang nam bla na myed pa yang dag par
168b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du rgyun myi 'chad do/ /de lha'i rna ba myi las 'das pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsungs pa thos te thos nas kyang 'dzin to/ /
168b4('bum): bzung nas kyang de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed do/ /de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /de sems kyi rnam grangs shes pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
168b5('bum): 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis rab tu shes so/ /'phags pa thams cad kyi sems kyang sems kyis rab tu shes so/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang sems kyis rab tu shes so/ /sems can thams
168b6('bum): cad kyi sems kyang sems kyis rab tu shes so/ /de sems can thams cad kyi sems sems kyis yongs su shes par byas shing / de bzhin nyid du chos ston to/ /de sngon kyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pas
168b7('bum): sems can de dag gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su shes par byas shing / yang sems can de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang
168b8('bum): dag par dga' bar byed do/ /de zag pa zad pa shes te zag pa zad pa shes pa des/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum po la rab tu 'god do/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol
169a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsungs pa'i sgra thos te/ de'i thos pa de yang ji srid du thos pa des/ bdag dang
169a2('bum): gzhan gyi don byas par ma gyur kyi bar du chud za bar myi 'gyur ro/ /sems kyi rnam pa shes pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thugs sems kyis rab tu shes te/ des sems kyi rnam pa shes pa de
169a3('bum): yang / ji srid du sems kyi rnam pa shes pa des/ sems can thams cad kyi don byas par ma gyur kyi bar du chud za bar myi 'gyur ro/ /de sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pas/ sems can de dag gi 'das
169a4('bum): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams shes shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sems can de dag yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar
169a5('bum): byed do/ /de dag de ltar yang dag par bstan pa dang / yang dag par skul ba dang / yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar byas pa rnams kyang khyad par du 'dong bar 'gyur ro/ /zag pa zad pa'i
169a6('bum): shes pas kyang sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la
169a7('bum): rab tu gzhog go/ /rang byang chub la rab tu gzhog go/ /byang chub la rab tu gzhog go/ /de bzhin tu sems can rnams dge ba'i chos gang dang / gang la mtha' yod pa de dang de la rab tu gzhog ste/ rab 'byor
169a8('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang /
169b1('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
169b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/
169b3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang /
169b4('bum): byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug
169b5('bum): gi bar du 'di lta ste/ gnod pa la myi mjed pa'i bzod pa dang / myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gnyis bsgoms te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod pa la myi mjed pa'i bzod pa
169b6('bum): ni/ de'i drung du sems can thams cad yang dang yang 'ongs te/ gshe zhing myi snyan par brjod de/ rdo ba dang / dbyug pas brdegs shing mtshon gyis btab kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
169b7('bum): dpa' chen pos 'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam gyi go skabs kyang myi dbye'o/ /des 'di ltar brtag par byas te/ de la gang la spyo ba dang / myi snyan par bya ba dang / gdab cing
169b8('bum): brdegs par bya ba yang gang yang myed/ gang gshe ba dang / myi snyan par rjod pa dang / brdeg pa dang 'debs pa yang myed cing / myi dmyigs so zhes bya bar brtag par bya'o/ /de la byang chub
170a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams can kyi ngo bo nyid la rtog na/ chos nyid kyang myi dmyigs
170a2('bum): na/ chos rnams kyi rang bzhin dmyigs pa lta ga la yod de/ des de ltar chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong bas/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang /
170a3('bum): dmyigs pa myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la de ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/
170a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /de sems can rnams yongs su
170a5('bum): smyin par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sbyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ bla na myed pa yang
170a6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/ /chos kyi
170a7('bum): 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum gyis 'khor ba las yongs su 'grel to/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
170a8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems
170b1('bum): kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed
170b2('bum): pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
170b3('bum): byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su
170b4('bum): myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pa yin/ sems kyi brtson
170b5('bum): 'grus dang ldan pa yin te/ de lus kyi brtson 'grus la gnas nas/ bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan gsum
170b6('bum): pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par bzhag cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do/ /
170b7('bum): sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yo bar byed do/ /gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro/ /mang por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /snang ba dang myi snang ba yang nyams su myong bar byed do/ /rtsig pa las thal
170b8('bum): ba dang / ra ba las thal ba dang / ri las thal bar thogs pa myed pa'i lus kyis 'gro ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no/ /nam mkha' la yang dkyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags
171a1('bum): bya bzhin no/ /sa la yang gyen tu 'byung ba dang / 'og tu yang 'dzul ba myed de/ dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/ /chu la yang 'bying ba myed par 'gro ste/ du bar 'thum zhing myer 'bar te/ dper
171a2('bum): na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no/ /nyi ma dang / zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la 'di ltar mthu che zhing / 'di ltar dbang che ba dag gis kyang lag pas byugs shing / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus
171a3('bum): kyis dbang sgyur te/ de lus kyi brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
171a4('bum): ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag tu song zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun kyi rkyen sman dang /
171a5('bum): yod byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de/ na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang po de dag kyang nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
171a6('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar tu zad par myi 'gyur te/ byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gos dang bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos lha dang myi dang /
171a7('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten bde bar 'gyur ro/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / ring bsrel la ring bsrel gyi mchod pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de nyid kyis
171a8('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi drung du song zhing / chos nyan te/ ji skad du thos pa de yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang
171b1('bum): chud za bar myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing / sems can rnams kyang yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas zhing yongs su 'dzin to/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
171b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par
171b3('bum): 'du bya ba myed pa la lus kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya
171b4('bum): pa/ bam po bcu pa/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed
171b5('bum): pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyi brtson 'grus 'phags pa zag pa myed pa lam gyi khongs su chud
171b6('bum): pa dang ldan pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos
171b7('bum): thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ sems dang po
171b8('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/ lus kyi las myi dge ba'i skabs myi 'byed/ ngag gi las myi dge ba'i skabs myi 'byed/ yid kyi las myi dge ba'i skabs
172a1('bum): myi 'byed de/ rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya ba 'am/ bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya ba 'am/ zhi zhes bya ba 'am/
172a2('bum): ma zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ dge zhes bya ba 'am/ myi dge zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas shes bya ba 'am/ nyon mongs
172a3('bum): pa myed ces bya ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba myed ces bya ba 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'am/ zag pa myed ces bya ba 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs
172a4('bum): pa zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam par byang ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas shes bya bar snyems pa myed do/ /'dod pa'i khams sam/ gzugs kyi khams sam/
172a5('bum): gzugs myed pa'i khams sam/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i khams sam/ zag pa myed pa'i khams sam/ bsam gtan dang po 'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/ bsam gtan gsum
172a6('bum): pa 'am/ bsam gtan bzhi pa 'am/ byams pa 'am/ snying rje 'am/ dga' 'am/ btang snyoms sam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dam/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
172a7('bum): dam/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched dam/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched dam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod
172a8('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid
172b1('bum): dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha'
172b2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong
172b3('bum): pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/
172b4('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
172b5('bum): pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/
172b6('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ stong pa nyid dam/ mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/
172b7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen
172b8('bum): po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la yang rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya ba 'am/ bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag
173a1('bum): myed ces bya ba 'am/ zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ dge zhes bya ba 'am/ myi dge zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba
173a2('bum): 'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas zhes bya ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa myed zhes bya ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas shes bya ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba myed ces bya ba 'am/ zag pa dang bcas shes bya ba 'am/
173a3('bum): zag pa myed ces bya ba 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa shes bya ba 'am/ rnam par byang ba myed pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas shes bya bar snyems pa myed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs
173a4('bum): pa'i 'bras bur snyems pa myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur snyems pa myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur snyems pa myed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid du snyems pa myed do/ /rang byang chub tu snyems
173a5('bum): pa myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid du snyems pa myed do/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu snyems pa myed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya bar yang snyems pa myed do/ /lan cig phyir
173a6('bum): 'ong ba zhes bya bar yang snyems pa myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba zhes bya bar yang snyems pa myed do/ /dgra bcom pa zhes bya bar yang snyems pa myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas shes bya bar yang snyems pa myed do/ /byang
173a7('bum): chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar yang snyems pa myed do/ /sangs rgyas shes bya bar yang snyems pa myed do/ /sems can 'di dag ni mthong ba'i lam gyis brjod pa/ 'di dag ni srabs pa'i sas brjod pa/
173a8('bum): 'di dag ni dam pa ma yin pa'i cha can gyis brjod pa/ 'di dag ni bla ma'i cha can gyis brjod pa/ 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas nyid kyis brjod pa/ 'di dag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis brjod pa/
173b1('bum): 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis brjod pa/ zhes bya bar yang snyems pa myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid gang gis brjod par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid de sems las byung
173b2('bum): ba'i brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas mngon tu gyur kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ sems can de dag kyang myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ brtson
173b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag
173b4('bum): par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang myi dmyigs so/ /de sems kyi brtson 'grus de lta bu dang ldan pas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin kyang de la chags pa myed de/ de chags pa myed
173b5('bum): par sems can rnams kyi don byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro/ 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste/ rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul gang dang gang gis
173b6('bum): rnam par 'phrul bar 'dod pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul de dang / des rnam par 'phrul te/ me tog gi 'char 'bab pa 'am/ spos kyi ngad 'gyed pa 'am/ 'brug gi sgras bsgrags pa 'am/ glu dang
173b7('bum): rol mo dang sil snyan gyi sgras bsgrags pa dang / sa bskyod pa 'am/ snang ba bstan pa 'am/ rin po che sna bdun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bstan pas rnam par 'phrul te/ gang dang gang du gang dang gang
173b8('bum): sems can rnams kyi don tu 'gyur ba de dag kyang bdag gi lus las 'gyed de/ sems can rnams kyi don tu bar 'ga' bdag las 'gyed do/ /bar 'ga' dri zhim po 'gyed do/ /bar 'ga'
174a1('bum): srog gcod pa myed pa'i mchod sbyin chen po byed do/ /bar 'ga' sems can mtha' yas pa lam ma yin pa nas/ 'don te srog gcod pa las zlog go/ /ma byin par len pa las zlog
174a2('bum): go/ /'dod pas log par g.yem pa las bzlog go/ /phra ma smra ba las zlog go/ /zhe gcod pa'i tshig las zlog go/ /brdzun du smra ba las zlog go/ /tshig kyal ba las zlog go/ /chags sems las zlog
174a3('bum): go/ /gnod sems las zlog go/ /log par lta ba las zlog go/ /la la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs so/ /la la ni tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs so/ /la la'i don tu ni yan lag dang nying lag
174a4('bum): yongs su gtong ngo / /la la'i don tu ni bu dang chung ma yongs su gtong ngo / /la la'i don tu ni rgyal srid yongs su gtong ngo / /la la'i don tu ni bdag yongs su gtong ste/ de ltar thabs gang dang gang gis sems
174a5('bum): can rnams kyi don tu 'gyur ba'i thabs de dang des sems can rnams kyi don byed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos
174a6('bum): thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
174a7('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs
174a8('bum): su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
174b1('bum): chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la
174b2('bum): mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin gzhan
174b3('bum): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de 'dod pas dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
174b4('bum): de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa myed pa/ dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam
174b5('bum): gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong ba la 'phags pa
174b6('bum): rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs sdug
174b7('bum): bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal ba myed pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te
174b8('bum): gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems dang dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/
175a1('bum): nam mkha'i mtha'as gtugs pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par bkang zhing nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /rnam
175a2('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /ting
175a3('bum): nge 'dzin kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnas shing / rnam par thar pa brgyad la lugs dang 'thun pa dang lugs dang myi mthun par snyoms par 'jug cing rnam par ldang ngo / /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
175a4('bum): 'jug pa dgu la mnyam par bzhag ste gnas so/ /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
175a5('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bar chad myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
175a6('bum): rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de ting nge 'dzin kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas nas/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi khongs
175a7('bum): su ting nge 'dzin thams cad chud par byas shing dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las 'da'o/ /dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las 'das nas/ rigs kyi sa las 'da'o/ /rigs kyi sa las 'das nas/
175a8('bum): brgyad pa'i sa las 'da'o/ /brgyad pa'i sa las 'das nas/ mthong ba'i sa las 'da'o/ /mthong ba'i sa las 'das nas/ bsrabs pa'i sa las 'da'o/ /bsrabs pa'i sa las 'das nas/ 'dod chags dang bral
175b1('bum): ba'i sa las 'da'o/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las 'das nas/ byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las 'da'o/ /byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las 'das nas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
175b2('bum): las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go/ /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /des de dag la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad
175b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma thob kyi bar du 'bras bu bar ma dor thob par myi byed do/ /de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mngon par
175b4('bum): shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang dge ba'i
175b5('bum): rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing /
175b6('bum): de la sems can rnams kyi don byed do/ /de la sems can la la ni sbyin pas yongs su sdud do/ /la la ni ting nge 'dzin kyis yongs su sdud do/ /la la ni shes rab kyis
175b7('bum): yongs su sdud do/ /la la ni rnam par grol bas yongs su sdud do/ /la la ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongs su sdud do/ /la la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go/ /la la ni lan
175b8('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go/ /la la ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu gzhog go/ /la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu gzhog go/ /la la ni rang byang chub la rab tu gzhog go/ /la la
176a1('bum): ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhog go/ /de ltar dge ba'i chos gang dang gang gis sems can rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba de dang de la sbyor te/ de ting nge 'dzin kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
176a2('bum): 'di la gnas shing / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mngon par sgrub bo/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu 'thob bo/ /rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams kyang thob pa yin te/ de nam yang
176a3('bum): las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ma'i mngal du skye bar myi 'gyur ro/ /nam yang 'dod pa la sten par myi 'gyur ro/ /sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i don tu skye ba yongs su myi 'dzin pa yang gang yang myed do/ /
176a4('bum): skye ba'i nyes pas kyang gos par myi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des sgyu ma lta bu'i chos thams cad rab tu mthong rab tu rig /rab tu rtogs pas na de sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du byed thams cad rig par
176a5('bum): byas shing / sems can thams cad kyi don byed do/ /des sgyu ma lta bu'i 'du byed thams cad rab tu rig pas sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyes te/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta
176a6('bum): bu la 'khor ba na/ sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin na/ bdag gis 'di dag nam zhig na/ sdug bsngal thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod par 'gyur zhes snying rje
176a7('bum): chen po skyes te/ de la yang sems can nam sems can du gdags pa dmyigs su myed de/ des chos thams cad ma dmyigs nas/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad nye bar bzung ste/ dmyigs su myed de de gnyis la/
176a8('bum): sems can rnams rab tu 'god do/ /don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par

176b3('bum): chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo / /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad rab tu spangs nas/ bdag gi don kyang byed/ gzhan gyi don kyang byed de/ des bdag dang / gzhan gyi

178b1('bum): su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des lus kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des lus kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub

178b3('bum): kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ lus kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des yid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub
178b4('bum): pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des yid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ yid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des yid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes

189a5('bum): su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong
189a6('bum): ngo / /des dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma
189a7('bum): mthong bas/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs
189a8('bum): su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /
189b1('bum): des rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/
189b2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes
189b3('bum): su myi mthong ste/ des chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des chos thams cad
189b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ chos thams
189b5('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi
189b6('bum): mthong ste/ des rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
189b7('bum): nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/
