194b1('bum): pa'i stobs rnams kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des de bzhin gshegs
194b2('bum): pa'i stobs rnams kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi skye ba'i
194b3('bum): sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des myi
194b4('bum): 'jigs pa rnams kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ myi 'jigs
194b5('bum): pa rnams kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des myi 'jigs
194b6('bum): pa rnams kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des so so yang dag
194b7('bum): par rig pa rnams kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/
194b8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par
195a1('bum): rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/
195a2('bum): gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des byams pa chen po'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des byams pa chen po'i yang dag pa dang / yongs
195a3('bum): su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ byams pa chen po'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /byams pa chen po'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ byams pa chen po'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag
195a4('bum): par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des byams pa chen po'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ byams pa chen po'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes
195a5('bum): su mthong ngo / /des snying rje chen po'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des snying rje chen po'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ snying rje
195a6('bum): chen po'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /snying rje chen po'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ snying rje chen po'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des snying rje chen po'i skye ba'i sgo yang
195a7('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ snying rje chen po'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yang dag
195a8('bum): pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
195b1('bum): rnams kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su
195b2('bum): myi mthong ngo / /des sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid
195b3('bum): dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i yang dag pa
195b4('bum): dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/
195b5('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i tshogs yang dag
195b6('bum): par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des
195b7('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /lan cig phyir 'ong
195b8('bum): ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su
196a1('bum): ma mthong bas/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras
196a2('bum): bu'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/
196a3('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par
196a4('bum): rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang / gsog
196a5('bum): nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des dgra bcom pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des dgra bcom pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa
196a6('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des dgra bcom pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang
196a7('bum): dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des dgra bcom pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag
196a8('bum): par rjes su mthong ngo / /des rang byang chub kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des rang byang chub kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ rang byang
196b1('bum): chub kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des rang byang chub kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ rang byang chub kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des rang byang chub kyi skye ba'i sgo yang
196b2('bum): dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ rang byang chub kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yang dag pa
196b3('bum): dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bas/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye ba yang
196b4('bum): dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des lam gyi rnam pa shes
196b5('bum): pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /des rnam pa
196b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yang dag pa dang / yongs su grub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bas/
196b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo
196b8('bum): yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo / /des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba'i sgo yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/
197a1('bum): gsob nyid dang / gsog nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo / /de de ltar rtog pa'i tshe/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes kyi rang bzhin
197a2('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i
197a3('bum): rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /sgra'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /dri'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /
197a4('bum): ro'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /reg gi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /chos kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i
197a5('bum): rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /myig
197a6('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus
197a7('bum): te reg pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myi
197a8('bum): dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myi
197b1('bum): dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /mye'i khams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs
197b2('bum): so/ /rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /'du
197b3('bum): byed kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug gi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /tshor
197b4('bum): ba'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /sred pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /len pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin
197b5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin
197b6('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
197b7('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi
197b8('bum): dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
198a1('bum): kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi
198a2('bum): rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang
198a3('bum): bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nyed bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin
198a4('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang
198a5('bum): bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams
198a6('bum): kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /
198a7('bum): smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin
198a8('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /
198b1('bum): snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin myi
198b2('bum): dmyigs so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /rnam
198b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin myi dmyigs so/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i rang bzhin de nyid du rtogs par byed de/ de de ltar rtogs par byed cing nang stong pa nyid la
198b4('bum): spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
198b5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos
198b6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
198b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ myig gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra
198b8('bum): 'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/
199a1('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/
199a2('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
199a3('bum): tshor ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ mye'i khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa 'am/
199a4('bum): 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ mying dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/ sbyin par pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims
199a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong
199a6('bum): pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong
199a7('bum): pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
199a8('bum): dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag
199b1('bum): rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad myed pa rnams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa
199b2('bum): rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rnams sam/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/
199b3('bum): gzugs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
199b4('bum): rnams sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub 'am/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam/ chos gang la yang
199b5('bum): mngon par chags pa myed do/ /de dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
199b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong
199b7('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed
199b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
200a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkyang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
200a2('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar kyis
200a3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzugs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin
200a4('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ myi
200a5('bum): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su 'dzin to/ /de byang chub kyi lam rnam par smyin pa'i chos can la gnas pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
200a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / shes
200a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
200a8('bum): chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
200b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su
200b2('bum): rdzogs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dngos po
200b3('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dbang
200b4('bum): po lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang / stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
200b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs
200b6('bum): su rdzogs pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par
200b7('bum): gyur nas/ sems can gang la sbyin pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang / sbyin pas phan 'dogs so/ /gang la tshul khrims kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs so/ /gang la bzod
200b8('bum): pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang bzod pas phan 'dogs so/ /gang la brtson 'grus kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang brtson 'grus kyis phan 'dogs so/ /gang la bsam gtan gyis phan gdags par bya ba de
201a1('bum): dag la yang bsam gtan gyis phan 'dogs so/ /gang la shes rab kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang shes rab kyis phan 'dogs so/ /gang la rnam par grol bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang
201a2('bum): rnam par grol bas phan 'dogs so/ /gang la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la yang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas phan 'dogs so/ /gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la
201a3('bum): dgod par bya ba de dag kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/ /gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/ /gang phyir myi
201a4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/ /gang dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god do/ /gang rang byang chub la
201a5('bum): dgod par bya ba de dag kyang / rang byang chub la rab tu 'god do/ /gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dag kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu
201a6('bum): 'god do/ /de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du mas rnam par 'phrul zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'gro ste/ de 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag rin po che gang las
201a7('bum): 'dod pa'i rin po che de dag las grub par mngon par sgrub ste/ de sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro ste/ des 'jig rten gyi khams
201a8('bum): de dag mthong nas/ ci 'dod par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/ 'di ltar dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i ris kyi longs spyod dang / skyid pa lta bu dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan btsal ba dang bral ba
201b1('bum): dag na/ longs spyod dang / skyid pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag der 'byung ste/ de rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam par
201b2('bum): smyin pa las byung ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam par smyin pa
201b3('bum): las byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi lam des lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod cing / chos thams
201b4('bum): cad yongs su rdzogs pa thob nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob ste/ gal te ci tsam du gzugs yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / tshor ba yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / 'du shes yongs su
201b5('bum): bzung ba myed pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / myig yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / rna ba yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / sna yongs su bzung ba
201b6('bum): myed pa dang / lce yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / lus yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / yid yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / gzugs yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / sgra yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / dri yongs su
201b7('bum): bzung ba myed pa dang / ro yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / reg yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / chos yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs
201b8('bum): su bzung ba myed pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa
202a1('bum): yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te
202a2('bum): reg pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba
202a3('bum): myed pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba myed
202a4('bum): pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / sa'i khams yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / chu'i khams yongs su bzung
202a5('bum): ba myed pa dang / mye'i khams yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / rlung gi khams yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / nam mkha'i khams yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / ma rig
202a6('bum): pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / 'du byed yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / mying dang gzugs yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / skye mched drug yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / reg pa yongs
202a7('bum): su bzung ba myed pa dang / tshor ba yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / sred pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / len pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / srid pa yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / skye ba yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / rga shi yongs
202a8('bum): su bzung ba myed pa dang / de bzhin du dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / myi dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
202b1('bum): chos rnams yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos rnams yongs su bzung
202b2('bum): ba myed pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams yongs su bzung ba myed pa dang / de bzhin du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der longs
202b3('bum): spyod pa dang / skyid pa thams cad yongs su bzung ba myed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dmyigs su myed pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bzung ba myed pa ste/ chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba myed pa'i
202b4('bum): phyir yang sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs
202b5('bum): su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
202b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa dang / byed pa myed pa dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
202b7('bum): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
202b8('bum): ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
203a1('bum): ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
203a2('bum): 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dor ba
203a3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
203a4('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
203a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
203a6('bum): dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /stobs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'phags
203a7('bum): pa'i bden pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa yongs
203a8('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes
203b1('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /myi 'jigs pa yongs
203b2('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
203b3('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug bcu rtsa gcig go// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ de nas
203b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis shing / mtshan ma ma mchis la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lags
203b5('bum): na/ ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
203b6('bum): tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang ji ltar na tha dad du gyur par gda' ba lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi
203b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bzod pa'i pha rol
203b8('bum): tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus
204a1('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par nang stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par
204a2('bum): phyi stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
204a3('bum): tu phyin par chen po stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/
204a4('bum): ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par thog
204a5('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji
204a6('bum): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par myi
204a7('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar
204a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
204b1('bum): tu phyin par/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dbang po rnams 'dus pa
204b2('bum): lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par stobs rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'phags
204b3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par bsam gtan rnams 'dus pa
204b4('bum): lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par tshad myed pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes
204b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rnam par thar pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha
204b6('bum): rol tu phyin par rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mngon par shes pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab
204b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin par ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
204b8('bum): 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par/ myi 'jigs pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par
205a1('bum): byams pa chen po 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par/ snying rje chen por 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'dus pa lags/
205a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar mtshan nyid kyang tha dad la 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig par gyur pa de dag rnam pa ji lta bur gdags par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
205a3('bum): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmyi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /
205a4('bum): tshul khrims srung ngo / /bzod pa sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /shes rab sgom mo/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /tshul khrims srung ngo / /bzod pa
205a5('bum): sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /shes rab sgom mo/ /smyig rgyu lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /tshul khrims srung ngo / /bzod pa sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /
205a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /shes rab sgom mo/ /chu zla lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /tshul khrims srung ngo / /bzod pa sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /shes rab
205a7('bum): sgom mo/ /myig yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /tshul khrims srung ngo / /bzod pa sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /shes rab sgom mo/ /sgra brnyan lta bu'i nye
205a8('bum): bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /tshul khrims srung ngo / /bzod pa sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /shes rab sgom mo/ /gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la
205b1('bum): gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /tshul khrims srung ngo / /bzod pa sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /shes rab sgom mo/ /dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa
205b2('bum): yongs su gtong ngo / /tshul khrims srung ngo / /bzod pa sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /shes rab sgom mo/ /sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /tshul
205b3('bum): khrims srung ngo / /bzod pa sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /shes rab sgom mo/ /de 'di ltar rtog ste nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni rmyi lam lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid myed pa'o/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sgyu
205b4('bum): ma lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid myed pa'o/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni smyig rgyu lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid myed pa'o/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni chu zla lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid myed pa'o/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni myig yor lta bu
205b5('bum): ste/ mtshan nyid myed pa'o/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid myed pa'o/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid myed pa'o/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni dri za'i grong khyer
205b6('bum): lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid myed pa'o/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid myed pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rmyi lam la rang bzhin gang yang myed do/ /sgyu ma la rang bzhin gang yang myed do/ /smyig rgyu la rang bzhin gang yang
205b7('bum): myed do/ /chu zla la rang bzhin gang yang myed do/ /myig yor la rang bzhin gang yang myed do/ /sgra brnyan la rang bzhin gang yang myed do/ /gzugs brnyan la rang bzhin gang yang myed do/ /dri za'i grong khyer la rang bzhin gang yang myed
205b8('bum): do/ /sprul pa la rang bzhin gang yang myed do/ /gang la rang bzhin myed pa de la mtshan nyid myed de/ gang la mtshan nyid myed pa de ni/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o zhes bya bar rtogs par byed de/
206a1('bum): rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sbyin pa ni mtshan nyid myed pa'o/ /gtong ba ni mtshan nyid myed pa'o/ /len pa ni mtshan nyid myed pa'o zhes bya bar shes par bya ste/ gang de ltar
206a2('bum): shes na/ sbyin pa gtong ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir myi ldog go/ /bzod
206a3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir myi ldog go/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir myi ldog go/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir myi ldog go/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir myi ldog
206a4('bum): go/ /de pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de la gnas shing / bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs
206a5('bum): par byed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs
206a6('bum): par byed do/ /stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /nang stong pa nyid yongs su
206a7('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su
206a8('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa
206b1('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /chos

206b7('bum): par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de 'phags pa'i chos byang ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thung mong ma yin pa rnam par smyin pa las byung ba rnams la gnas shing /
206b8('bum): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag gi drung du/ rdzu 'phrul gyis song
207a1('bum): zhing na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de/ longs spyod dang / skyid pa thams cad kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi
207a2('bum): don byed do/ /de na sems can gang sbyin pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang sbyin pas yongs su sdud do/ /gang tshul khrims kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang tshul khrims kyis yongs su sdud do/ /gang bzod pas yongs

209a1('bum): myi gnas so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la myi gnas so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid shes kyang de la myi gnas so/ /rang byang chub shes kyang de la myi gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des chos thams

209b7('bum): nyid myed par shes so/ /snying rje chen po mtshan nyid myed par shes so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid myed par shes so/ /lan cig phyir
209b8('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid myed par shes so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid myed par shes so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so/ /rang byang chub mtshan nyid myed par shes so/ /lam gyi rnam
210a1('bum): pa shes pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
210a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmyi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgyu ma lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ smyig rgyu lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/
210a3('bum): chu zla lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ myig yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len
210a4('bum): pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
210a5('bum): par byed do/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rmyi lam lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sgyu ma lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga smyig
210a6('bum): rgyu lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga chu zla lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga myig yor lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sgra brnyan lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga
210a7('bum): gzugs brnyan lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dri za'i grong khyer lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sprul pa lta bur shes nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid myed
210a8('bum): pa/ ma zhig pa ma ral ba/ skyon myed pa/ rnyog pa myed pa/ nyams pa myed pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa/ shin tu rdzogs pa/ 'phags par gyur pa/ zag pa myed pa/ lam gyi
210b1('bum): khongs su chud pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa/ yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de la gnas shing yang dag par blang ba'i brda' dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos nyid kyis thob pa'i tshul khrims dang /
210b2('bum): sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / dmyigs pa'i tshul khrims dang / spyad pa'i tshul khrims dang / myi spyad pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo / /de tshul khrims de lta bu dang ldan pa yang 'dis bdag rgyal rigs che
210b3('bum): zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal pa mnyam pa 'am/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang / skal pa mnyam pa 'am/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal pa mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/ rgyal phran
210b4('bum): nam/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bar bya'o zhe 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum 'am/ mtshe ma 'am/ dga' ldan nam/ 'phrul
210b5('bum): dga' 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o zhe 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i
210b6('bum): 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ byang chub thob par bya'o zhes tshul khrims des snyems pa myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid myed pa ste/ 'di ltar dngos
210b7('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gcig na/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos kyis mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos thob par myi rung ngo / /mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos thob
210b8('bum): par myi rung ngo / /mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos kyis kyang / mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos thob par myi rung ngo / /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
211a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go/ /byang chub
211a2('bum): sems dpa' skyon myed par 'jug pa'i tshe/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga rab tu thob nas/ gzungs kyi
211a3('bum): sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi sgo lnga brgya la gnas te/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
211a4('bum): 'gro ste/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/ /de 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na 'khor yang / 'khor ba'i las rnam par smyin pas gos par myi 'gyur te/ 'di lta
211a5('bum): ste dper na/ sprul pa ni 'gro ba 'am/ sdod pa 'am/ 'dug pa 'am/ nyal ba byed kyang de la 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba 'am/ sdod pa 'am/ 'dug pa 'am/ nyal ba yang myi dmyigs te/ de sems can rnams kyi don
211a6('bum): kyang byed do/ /sems can dang sems can du btags pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu zhi ba zhes bya ba/ bla
211a7('bum): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can tshad myed pa theg pa gnyis kyis yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang gang bla na myed pa
211a8('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu gang yang ma gzigs nas/ des tshe'i 'du byed spangs nas sprul pa sprul ba mdzad de/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /
211b1('bum): rab 'byor de ltar sprul pa des bskal pa gcig lon nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/ /yongs
211b2('bum): su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ dngos po gang yang dmyigs su myed do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
211b3('bum): dpa' chen po yang sems can nam sems can du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs la/ sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
211b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de yongs su rdzogs pas mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos thams cad khongs su chud par shes so/ /
211b5('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmyi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig g.yor lta bu dang / sgyu
211b6('bum): ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas te/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
211b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa
211b8('bum): gnyis kyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ nyams su len pa'i bzod pa dang / chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa'o/ /de la nyams su len pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/ sems dang po
212a1('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du gal te sems can thams cad yang dang yang 'ongs shing gshe ba 'am/ myi snyan
212a2('bum): par brjod cing ma klas pa'i tshig brlang ba zer bar gyur tam/ rdo dbyug dang / mtshon cas brdegs sam/ btab kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
212a3('bum): par 'dod pas/ sems bskyed pa 'ga' tsam yang 'khrugs pa dang ldan pa 'am/ gnod sems dang ldan pa bskyed par myi bya ste/ phyir sems can de dag la kye ma sems can 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis mnar
212a4('bum): pa ste/ 'di dag la bdag gis sdig to'i sems myi skyed kyi/ 'di ni bdag nyid kyis phung po'i dgrar gyur pa 'di rnams blangs pa'i lan to zhes de dag la lhag par snying rje bskyed par bya'o/ /byams pa dang ldan te/
212a5('bum): snying rje bar gyur nas/ rnam pa de ltar rtog pa 'di ni nyams su len pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/ sems can de dag kyang don dam par dmyigs su myed na/ bdag la gshe
212a6('bum): ba 'am/ myi snyan par brjod pa 'am/ ma klas pa'i tshig brlang po zer ba 'am/ rdo dbyug gis brdeg cing 'tshon 'debs pa lta bu zhig yod de/ 'du byed thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu gsob gsog rag las pa/
212a7('bum): nam mkha' lta bu bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso' ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed bdag dang / bral ba ste/ rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni yongs su
212a8('bum): rtog pa las byung ba yin na/ bdag la gshe ba dang / myi snyan par brjod pa dang / tshig brlang bar zer ba dang / rdo dbyug gi rdeg cing mtshon 'debs pa lta bu zhig yod de/ bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa
212b1('bum): nyid nye bar bzung ste/ de ltar rnam par brtag par myi bya'o zhes bya ba'i 'di ni chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ste/ de de ltar yongs su rtog cing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de bzod
212b2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa des/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob bo/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bgyi ba ni gang lags/ de la spangs pa ni
212b3('bum): ci mchis/ ye shes ni ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos gang la rdul tsam yang skye ba myed pa de ni myi skye ba'o/ /de gang gis shes pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya ste/ shes pa des myi skye ba'i
212b4('bum): chos la bzod pa 'thob bo/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i
212b5('bum): chos la bzod pa gang lags pa'i bzod pa de dag la bye brag du bgyi ba ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub
212b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i shes pa
212b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o/ /
212b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i bye
213a1('bum): brag yin no/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil kyis gnon te/ de rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i myi skye ba'i
213a2('bum): chos kyi bzod pa la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod cing / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de yongs su rdzogs pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
213a3('bum): myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / myi 'bral ba yin/ de mngon par shes pa lnga dang myi 'bral ba yin/ de mngon par shes pa rnams dang myi 'bral bas/ sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed pa yin/
213a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin/ de sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/ skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
213a5('bum): nyid thob par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid myed pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rab 'byor
213a6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmyi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig
213a7('bum): rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /de lus kyi brtson 'grus kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub ste/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams
213a8('bum): cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag du song nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing / sems can rnams kyi don byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /de lus
213b1('bum): kyi brtson 'grus des sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byas nas/ theg pa gsum la 'dzud cing rab tu 'god de/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
213b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de sems kyi brtson 'grus zag pa myed pa/ lam gyi yan lag du gyur pa/
213b3('bum): lam gyi khongs su chud pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
213b4('bum): dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang /
213b5('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
213b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la spyod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
213b7('bum): chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de yongs su rdzogs pas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/ /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba
213b8('bum): thams cad spangs nas/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /kun tu snang ba thob par byas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyud gsum du bskor ba bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /
214a1('bum): de bskor bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yo ba dang / rab tu g.yo ba dang / kun nas g.yo' ba dang / 'gul ba dang / rab tu 'gul ba dang / kun nas 'gul ba dang /
214a2('bum): ldeg pa dang / rab tu ldeg pa dang / kun tu ldeg par 'gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
214a3('bum): p a yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i sgra gang du byung bar dbyangs grag par 'gyur ba'i sgra de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed kyis thos pa de thams cad theg pa gsum la
214a4('bum): nges par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar phan pa chen po dang ldan pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ byang chub sems
214a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
214a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmyi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i
214a7('bum): phung po lnga la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmyi lam lta
214a8('bum): bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
214b1('bum): par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan gsum
214b2('bum): pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /byams pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /snying rje chen po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /dga' ba la nye bar bsgrubs te
214b3('bum): gnas so/ /btang snyoms la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /chung zad myed pa'i
214b4('bum): skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /glog lta bu'i ting nge
214b5('bum): 'dzin sgom mo/ /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par nyan thos dang thun mong ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / thun mong
214b6('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang ji snyed pa dang / gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lus kyis khyab par byas shing / nye bar bsgrubs te gnas kyang / ting nge 'dzin de dag dang /
214b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu'i ro myong bar myi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gi mtshan nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
214b8('bum): du shes pas na/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar byed par yang ga la 'gyur/ dngos po myed pa'i chos kyang dngos po myed pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar byed par yang ga la 'gyur te/ de ro
215a1('bum): myong bar byed pa myed pas/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis dbang gis kyang / gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i khams su skye bar myi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des khams de gnyis
215a2('bum): kyang myi dmyigs/ gang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gang gis snyoms par 'jug pa de yang myi dmyigs so/ /de myi dmyigs pas mtshan nyid myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
215a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da'o/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin
215a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da' ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
215a5('bum): dpa' chen pos/ nang stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa
215a6('bum): dang / chen po stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /
215a7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la shin
215a8('bum): tu bslabs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong
215b1('bum): pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / stong pa nyid 'di dag la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/
215b2('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub 'am/ gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang myi dmyigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
215b3('bum): pa nyid ces bya ba de yang stong pa nyid rnams kyis stong ste/ stong pa nyid de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shin tu 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon
215b4('bum): myed par 'jug go/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon ni gang lags/ skyon ma mchis pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
215b5('bum): rab 'byor dmyigs pa thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon no/ /myi dmyigs pa thams cad ni skyon myed pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dmyigs pa ni gang lags/ myi
215b6('bum): dmyigs pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o/ /rab 'byor tshor ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
215b7('bum): dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'du shes ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'du byed ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o/ /rab
215b8('bum): 'byor rnam par shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o/ /myig dang gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o/ /rna ba dang sgra ni byang chub sems dpa'
216a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o/ /sna dang dri ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o/ /lce dang ro ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o/ /lus dang
216a2('bum): reg bya ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o/ /yid dang chos ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus
216a3('bum): te reg pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni dmyigs pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

216a5('bum): dmyigs pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni dmyigs pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /
216a6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni dmyigs pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni dmyigs pa'o/ /
216a7('bum): sa'i khams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /chu'i khams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /mye'i khams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /rlung gi khams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /nam mkha'i khams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni dmyigs
216a8('bum): pa'o/ /ma rig pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /'du byed ni dmyigs pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /mying dang gzugs ni dmyigs pa'o/ /skye mched drug ni dmyigs pa'o/ /reg pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /tshor ba ni
216b1('bum): dmyigs pa'o/ /sred pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /len pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /srid pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /skye ba ni dmyigs pa'o/ /rga shi ni dmyigs pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi
216b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu

216b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dmyigs
216b7('bum): pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /dbang po rnams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /stobs rnams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /
216b8('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /bsam gtan rnams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
217a1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni dmyigs pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
217a2('bum): myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dmyigs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dmyigs
217a3('bum): pa'o/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni dmyigs pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dmyigs pa'o/ /byams pa chen po ni dmyigs pa'o/ /snying rje chen po ni dmyigs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni

217a7('bum): pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
217a8('bum): pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
217b1('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang /

217b7('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
217b8('bum): lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar
