220a3('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /chos thams
220a4('bum): cad stong pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
220a5('bum): la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/
220a6('bum): gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rang bzhin myed
220a7('bum): de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la
220a8('bum): rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /dbang po rnams la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /stobs rnams la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /
220b1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /'phags
220b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /bsam gtan rnams la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /tshad myed pa rnams la rang
220b3('bum): bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad la rang
220b4('bum): bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
220b5('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /ting
220b6('bum): nge 'dzin rnams la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
220b7('bum): la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la rang bzhin
220b8('bum): myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /byams pa chen po la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /snying rje chen po la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed
221a1('bum): pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rang bzhin myed de/
221a2('bum): gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la
221a3('bum): rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /rang byang chub la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /
221a4('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /rab
221a5('bum): 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon myed pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon myed par zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
221a6('bum): pa de ni ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang myi skye na/ 'dod chags sam/ zhe sdang ngam/ gti mug gis skye bar 'gyur zhing de la gnas te/ de'i las mngon par 'du byed pa dang / las de mngon
221a7('bum): par 'dus byas pas 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar ltung bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas myed do/ /gzhan du na sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams la gnas shing / sems can thams cad kyi don byed de/ sems can
221a8('bum): nam sgyu mar yang dmyigs pa myed do/ /de sems can dang sgyu ma myi dmyigs pas/ sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems
221b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du ste/ myi dmyigs pa'i 'khor lo dang /
221b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i 'khor lo bskor ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad
221b3('bum): rmyi lam lta bur yongs su shes so/ /chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur yongs su shes so/ /chos thams cad myig yor lta bur yongs su shes so/ /chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes so/ /chos thams cad
221b4('bum): smyig rgyu lta bur yongs su shes so/ /chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur yongs su shes so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
221b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ ji ltar na chos thams cad rmyi lam lta bur yang dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/ ji ltar na chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/
221b6('bum): ji ltar na chos thams cad myig yor lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/ ji ltar na chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/ ji ltar
221b7('bum): na chos thams cad smyig rgyu lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/ ji ltar na chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'tshal ba lags/ bcom
221b8('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmyi lam myi mthong ngo / /rmyi lam mthong ba mi mthong ngo / /
222a1('bum): sgra brnyan myi thos so/ /sgra brnyan nyan pa myi mthong ngo / /myig yor myi mthong ngo / /myig yor mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /sgyu ma myi mthong ngo / /sgyu ma mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /smyig rgyu myi mthong ngo / /smyig rgyu mthong ba myi mthong
222a2('bum): ngo / /sprul pa myi mthong ngo / /sprul pa mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi rmyi lam ni phyin ci log go/ /sgra brnyan ni phyin ci log go/ /
222a3('bum): myig yor ni phyin ci log go/ /sgyu ma ni phyin ci log go/ /smyig rgyu ni phyin ci log go/ /sprul pa ni phyin ci log go/ /dgra bcom pa ni rmyi lam myi mthong ngo / /rmyi lam mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /sgra brnyan myi thos so/ /
222a4('bum): sgra brnyan nyan pa myi mthong ngo / /myig yor myi mthong ngo / /myig yor mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /sgyu ma myi mthong ngo / /sgyu ma mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /smyig rgyu myi mthong ngo / /smyig rgyu mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /sprul pa
222a5('bum): myi mthong ngo / /sprul pa mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /rang sangs rgyas ni rmi lam myi mthong ngo / /rmyi lam mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /sgra brnyan myi thos so/ /sgra brnyan nyan pa myi mthong ngo / /myig yor myi mthong ngo / /
222a6('bum): myig yor mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /sgyu ma myi mthong ngo / /sgyu ma mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /smyig rgyu myi mthong ngo / /smyig rgyu mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /sprul pa myi mthong ngo / /sprul pa mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /byang
222a7('bum): chub sems dpa' ni rmyi lam myi mthong ngo / /rmyi lam mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /sgra brnyan myi thos so/ /sgra brnyan nyan pa myi mthong ngo / /myig yor myi mthong ngo / /myig yor mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /sgyu ma myi
222a8('bum): mthong ngo / /sgyu ma mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /smyig rgyu myi mthong ngo / /smyig rgyu mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /sprul pa myi mthong ngo / /sprul pa mthong ba myi mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
222b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rmyi lam myi gzigs so/ /rmyi lam mthong ba myi gzigs so/ /sgra brnyan myi gsan to/ /sgra brnyan nyan pa myi gzigs so/ /myig yor myi gzigs so/ /myig yor mthong ba myi gzigs so/ /sgyu ma
222b2('bum): myi gzigs so/ /sgyu ma mthong ba myi gzigs so/ /smyig rgyu myi gzigs so/ /smyig rgyu mthong ba myi gzigs so/ /sprul pa myi gzigs so/ /sprul pa mthong ba myi gzigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar yang dag pa ma
222b3('bum): yin pas/ chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad yongs su grub pa myed na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
222b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po'i 'du shes sam/ yongs su grub pa'i 'du shes sam/ yang dag pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/ de ni gnas myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te
222b5('bum): chos la la zhig gi ngo bo nyid dam/ yongs su grub pa 'am/ yang dag par gyur pa zhig dmyigs na ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang myi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
222b6('bum): phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ /gzugs la chags pa myed do/ /tshor ba la chags pa myed do/ /'du shes la chags pa myed do/ /'du byed la chags pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do/ /khams rnams
222b7('bum): la chags pa myed do/ /skye mched rnams la chags pa myed do/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la chags pa myed do/ /'dod pa'i khams la chags pa myed do/ /gzugs kyi khams la chags pa myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i khams la chags pa myed do/ /
222b8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa myed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa myed do/ /bsam gtan
223a1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la chags pa
223a2('bum): myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /'dus ma byas
223a3('bum): stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /rang bzhin
223a4('bum): stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong
223a5('bum): pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la chags pa myed do/ /yang dag par
223a6('bum): spong ba rnams la chags pa myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags pa myed do/ /dbang po rnams la chags pa myed do/ /stobs rnams la chags pa myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la
223a7('bum): chags pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa la chags pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams la chags pa myed do/ /
223a8('bum): tshad myed pa rnams la chags pa myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad la chags pa myed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
223b1('bum): par 'jug pa dgu la chags pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la chags pa myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la
223b2('bum): chags pa myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags pa myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la chags pa myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams la chags pa myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la chags pa
223b3('bum): myed do/ /byams pa chen po la chags pa myed do/ /snying rje chen po la chags pa myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa myed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
223b4('bum): 'bras bu la chags pa myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la chags pa myed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /rang byang chub la chags pa myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /rnam pa
223b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing / sa dang po yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags myi skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
223b6('bum): de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang myi dmyigs na/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur te/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing sa gnyis pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/
223b7('bum): de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags myi skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang myi dmyigs na/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
223b8('bum): gnas shing / sa gsum pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags myi skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang myi dmyigs na/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga
224a1('bum): la 'gyur/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing sa bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags myi skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang myi dmyigs na/ de la 'dod
224a2('bum): pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing / sa lnga pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags myi skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des sa
224a3('bum): de yang myi dmyigs na/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing / sa drug pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags myi skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir
224a4('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang myi dmyigs na/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing / sa bdun pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags
224a5('bum): myi skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang myi dmyigs na/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing / sa brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/
224a6('bum): de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags myi skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang myi dmyigs na/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing / sa dgu pa
224a7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags myi skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang myi dmyigs na/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
224a8('bum): gnas shing / sa bcu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags myi skyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des sa de yang myi dmyigs na/ de la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyed par lta ga la 'gyur/
224b1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang myi dmyigs so/ /de myi dmyigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa der chos thams
224b2('bum): cad kyang 'dus par mthong ste/ chos de dag kyang myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos de dag dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /de ci'i
224b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos de dag ni tha dad du bya ba gang yang myed de/ chos kyi dbyings su bstan pa dang / de bzhin nyid du bstan pa dang / yang dag pa'i mthar bstan pas chos thams cad dbyer myed do/ /
224b4('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa lags na/ ji ltar dge ba dang myi dge ba'i chos rnams bstan pa lags/ ji ltar 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig
224b5('bum): rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams bstan pa lags/ ji ltar zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams bstan pa lags/ ji ltar 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma
224b6('bum): byas kyi chos rnams bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la 'dus byas sam/ 'dus
224b7('bum): ma byas sam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang
224b8('bum): chub 'am/ sems gang yang brjod du yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
225a1('bum): rab 'byor de bas na khyod kyis rnam grangs des 'di ltar chos thams cad dbyer myed pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid myed pa dang / skye ba myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed par rig par bya'o/ /
225a2('bum): rab 'byord sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs shes bya ba 'am/ 'du shes zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/
225a3('bum): myig ces bya ba 'am/ rna ba zhes bya ba 'am/ sna zhes bya ba 'am/ lce zhes bya ba 'am/ lus shes bya ba 'am/ yid ces bya ba 'am/ gzugs shes bya ba 'am/ /sgra zhes bya ba 'am/
225a4('bum): dri zhes bya ba 'am/ ro zhes bya ba 'am/ reg ces bya ba 'am/ chos shes bya ba 'am/ myig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ sna'i rnam par
225a5('bum): shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'am/
225a6('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya
225a7('bum): ba 'am/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/
225a8('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ sa'i khams shes bya ba 'am/
225b1('bum): chu'i khams shes bya ba 'am/ mye'i khams shes bya ba 'am/ rlung gi khams shes bya ba 'am/ nam mkha'i khams shes bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya ba 'am/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'am/
225b2('bum): 'du byed ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ mying dang gzugs zhes bya ba 'am/ skye mched drug ces bya ba 'am/ reg pa zhes bya ba 'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ sred pa zhes bya ba 'am/ len
225b3('bum): pa zhes bya ba 'am/ srid pa zhes bya ba 'am/ skye ba zhes bya ba 'am/ rga shi zhes bya ba 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol
225b4('bum): tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'am/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/
225b5('bum): phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya
225b6('bum): ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/
225b7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ces
225b8('bum): bya ba 'am/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/ yang dag par spong ba rnams shes bya ba 'am/
226a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/ dbang po rnams shes bya ba 'am/ stobs rnams shes bya ba 'am/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya ba 'am/ 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa zhes
226a2('bum): bya ba 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/ bsam gtan rnams shes bya ba 'am/ tshad myed pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/
226a3('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba 'am/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed dang / smon pa myed pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/ mngon par shes
226a4('bum): pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/ ting nge 'dzin rnams shes bya ba 'am/ gzungs kyis sgo rnams shes bya ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'am/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'am/ so so yang
226a5('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'am/ byams pa chen po zhes bya ba 'am/ snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'am/ dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya ba
226a6('bum): 'am/ myi dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa myed pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/
226a7('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ thun mong gi chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/
226a8('bum): thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba
226b1('bum): 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ rang byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/
226b2('bum): chos gang gi rang bzhin yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bla na myed
226b3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar tu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la mkhas par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
226b4('bum): thams cad kyi rang bzhin la mkhas pa ni byang chub kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/ /de la gnas te/
226b5('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams ci nas kyang dul bar gyur nas/ srid pa gsum na myi snang ba de ltar rnam par btul
226b6('bum): lo/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /
226b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug cu rtsa gnyis so// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad
226b8('bum): rmyi lam lta bu dngos po ma mchis pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa rnams la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/ /'di dag ni myi dge ba'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/ /
227a1('bum): 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni zag pa myed pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/ /
227a2('bum): 'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon tu bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon tu bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /
227a3('bum): 'di dag ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /zhes bgyi bar
227a4('bum): ji ltar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/ chos thams cad sgra brnyan lta bu/ myig yor lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/ smyig rgyu lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu/ dngos po ma mchis pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid rang gi
227a5('bum): mtshan nyid kyis stong pa rnams la/ 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/ /'di dag ni myi dge ba'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas
227a6('bum): pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni zag pa myed pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di
227a7('bum): dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur
227a8('bum): 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o zhes bgyi bar ji ltar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/
227b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byis pa thos pa dang / myi ldan pa so so'i skye bo ni rmyi lam yang dmyigs la/ rmyi lam mthong ba yang dmyigs so/ /sgra brnyan yang dmyigs la/
227b2('bum): sgra brnyan nyan par yang dmyigs so/ /myig yor yang dmyigs la/ myig yor mthong ba yang dmyigs so/ /sgyu ma yang dmyigs la/ sgyu ma mthong ba yang dmyigs so/ /smyig rgyu yang dmyigs la/ smyig rgyu
227b3('bum): mthong ba yang dmyigs so/ /sprul pa yang dmyigs la/ sprul pa mthong ba yang dmyigs so/ /des rmyi lam yang dmyigs la/ rmyi lam mthong ba yang dmyigs/ sgra brnyan yang dmyigs/ sgra brnyan nyan pa yang dmyigs/
227b4('bum): myig yor yang dmyigs/ myig yor mthong ba yang dmyigs/ sgyu ma yang dmyigs/ sgyu ma mthong ba yang dmyigs/ smyig rgyu yang dmyigs/ smyig rgyu mthong ba yang dmyigs/ sprul pa yang dmyigs/ sprul pa mthong
227b5('bum): ba yang dmyigs nas/ lus dang ngag dang / yid kyis dge ba'i 'du bya ba la yang mngon par 'du byed do/ /lus dang ngag dang / yid kyis myi dge ba'i 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do/ /de bzhin du lus dang ngag
227b6('bum): dang / yid kyi bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa dang / myi g.yo' ba'i 'du bya ba yang mngon par 'du byed do/ /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
227b7('bum): pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid gnyis la gnas shing / sems cad rnams la chos ston te/ khams gsum po 'di ni stong pa
227b8('bum): ste/ 'di la gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ phung po rnams sam/ khams rnams sam/ skye mched rnams myed do/ /
228a1('bum): 'di ni rmyi lam/ 'di ni sgra brnyan/ 'di ni myig yor/ 'di ni sgyu ma/ 'di ni smyig rgyu/ 'di ni sprul pa ste/ phung po rnams sam/ khams rnams sam/ skye mched rnams myed do/ /'di la
228a2('bum): rmyi lam myed do/ /rmyi lam mthong ba myed do/ /sgra brnyan myed do/ /sgra brnyan nyan pa myed do/ /myig yor mthong ba myed do/ /sgyu ma myed do/ /sgyu ma mthong ba myed do/ /smyig rgyu myed do/ /
228a3('bum): smyig rgyu mthong ba myed do/ /sprul pa myed do/ /sprul pa byed pa myed do/ /chos 'di dag thams cad ni dngos po myed pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/ 'on kyang khyod ni phung po myed pa la phung por 'du shes pa/
228a4('bum): khams myed pa la khams su 'du shes pa/ skye mched myed pa la skye mched du 'du shes pa dag ste/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba phyin ci log las skyes pa/ las kyi rnam par smyin
228a5('bum): pas yongs su bzung ba yin na/ khyed rnams ci'i phyir chos thams cad dngos po myed pa la dngos po'i 'du shes su byed ces te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
228a6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can ser sna can dag ser sna las rnam par bzlog nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor te/ sbyin pa yongs su btang ba de yang de dag la longs spyod chen po'i
228a7('bum): rgyur 'gyur ro/ /des dag de las bskyod nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor te/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa de yang de dag la mtho ris su skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /des dag de las bskyod nas/
228a8('bum): ting nge 'dzin la sbyor te/ ting nge 'dzin de yang de dag la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /des dag de las bskyod nas/ bsam gtan dang po la sbyor te/ bsam gtan dang po las bskyod nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa
228b1('bum): la sbyor ro/ /bsam gtan gnyis pa las bskyod nas/ bsam gtan gsum pa la sbyor ro/ /bsam gtan gsum pa las bskyod nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la sbyor ro/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa las bskyod nas/ nam
228b2('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyor ro/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las bskyod nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyor ro/ /
228b3('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las bskyod nas/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyor ro/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las bskyod nas/
228b4('bum): 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyor ro/ /des sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dma' ba de las rnam grangs du mas bskyod de/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su
228b5('bum): dbugs 'byin to/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /des tshul khrims dang / tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu de las rnam grangs du mas bskyod de/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu gzhog go/ /des ting
228b6('bum): nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi 'bras bu de las rnam grangs du mas bskyod de/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rab tu gzhog go/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag
228b7('bum): par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul
228b8('bum): lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /
229a1('bum): yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /dbang po lnga la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /
229a2('bum): yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /stobs lnga la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /
229a3('bum): 'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /
229a4('bum): gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /
229a5('bum): gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /
229a6('bum): rab tu 'god do/ /bsam gtan bzhi la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /
229a7('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /mthar kyis
229a8('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
229b1('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /mngon
229b2('bum): par shes pa rnams la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la yang dag par
229b3('bum): ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /
229b4('bum): yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng
229b5('bum): bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par
229b6('bum): dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga'
229b7('bum): bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /byams pa chen po la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /
229b8('bum): 'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /snying rje chen po la yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /
230a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad pa yang dag par ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /
230a2('bum): rab tu 'god do/ /de zag pa myed pa'i chos gzugs myed pa bstan du myed pa thogs pa myed pa de dag gis gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu don tu gnyer ba de dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/ /
230a3('bum): gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu don tu gnyer ba de dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/ /gang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu don tu gnyer ba de dag phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god do/ /
230a4('bum): gang dgra bcom pa nyid don tu gnyer ba de dag dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu 'god do/ /gang rang byang chub don tu gnyer ba de dag rang byang chub la rab tu 'god do/ /gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don tu
230a5('bum): gnyer ba de dag byang chub kyi lam brjod cing ston to/ /yang dag par skul lo/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod do/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed do/ /'dul lo/ /gzhog go/ /rab tu 'god do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
230a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad rmyi lam lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul
230a7('bum): pa lta bu dang / dngos po myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa la rnam par dgod par byed do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
230a8('bum): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / chos thams cad
230b1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma mchis pa stong pa nyid la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/ /'di dag ni myi dge ba'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das
230b2('bum): pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba myed pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni zag pa myed pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'dus byas
230b3('bum): kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni phyir
230b4('bum): myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
230b5('bum): byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par bgyid pa ni ngo mtshar te/ rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka'
230b6('bum): stsal to/ /rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
230b7('bum): chos thams cad mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so/ /'di dag ni myi dge ba'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni 'jig rten
230b8('bum): las 'das pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni kha na ma tho ba myed pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so/ /'di dag ni zag pa myed pa'i chos so/ /
231a1('bum): 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya
231a2('bum): ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni rang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'di dag ni bla
231a3('bum): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /zhes bya bar rnam par dgod pa byed pa de ni ngo mtshar te/ rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
231a4('bum): gang gi ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos de shes kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la slar phan gdags par bya ba sla ba ma yin te/ khyed cag thams cad kyis kyang
231a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos de zil kyis gnan par myi nus so/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la ma mchis pa'i ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/
231a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la mchis pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o/ /rab 'byor
231a7('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i stong pa nyid
231a8('bum): thams cad la gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung
231b1('bum): ba'i bsam gtan bzhi la gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i tshad myed pa bzhi la gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung
231b2('bum): ba'i rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed
231b3('bum): pa dang / smon pa myed pa la gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga la gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
231b4('bum): gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i myi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas/
231b5('bum): rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i byams pa chen po la gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i snying rje chen po la gnas/ rnam par smyin pa las byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gnas shing / phyogs dang
231b6('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song zhing / sems can gang la sbyin pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni sbyin pas phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la tshul khrims kyis phan gdags par bya
231b7('bum): ba de dag la ni tshul khrims kyis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la bzod pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni bzod pas phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la brtson 'grus kyis phan gdags par
231b8('bum): bya ba de dag la ni brtson 'grus kyis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la ting nge 'dzin kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni ting nge 'dzin kyis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la
232a1('bum): shes rab kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni shes rab kyis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la bsam gtan dang pos phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni bsam gtan dang pos phan 'dogs so/ /sems can
232a2('bum): gang la bsam gtan gnyis pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni bsam gtan gnyis pas phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la bsam gtan gsum pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni bsam gtan
232a3('bum): gsum pas phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la bsam gtan bzhi pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni bsam gtan bzhi pas phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
232a4('bum): mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
232a5('bum): kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la chung zad myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas
232a6('bum): phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan gdags par bya
232a7('bum): ba de dag la ni/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pas phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la byams pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni byams pas phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang
232a8('bum): la snying rjes phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni snying rjes phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la dga' bas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni dga' bas phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la btang snyoms kyis phan gdags
232b1('bum): par bya ba de dag la ni btang snyoms kyis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la yang
232b2('bum): dag par spong ba bzhis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ yang dag par spong ba bzhis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
232b3('bum): bzhis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la dbang po lngas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ dbang po lngas phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la stobs lngas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ stobs lngas phan
232b4('bum): 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
232b5('bum): pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ 'phags pa'i
232b6('bum): bden pa rnams kyis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la mthar kyis gnas pa'i
232b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgus phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin kyis phan gdags
232b8('bum): par bya ba de dag la ni/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin kyis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ mtshan ma myed pa'i
233a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin kyis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang
233a2('bum): la mngon par shes pa rnams kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis phan gdags par
233a3('bum): bya ba de dag la ni/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
233a4('bum): bcus phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la myi 'jigs pa bzhis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ myi 'jigs pa bzhis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis phan gdags
233a5('bum): par bya ba de dag la ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
233a6('bum): pa bcwo brgyad kyis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la snying rje chen pos phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ snying rje chen pos phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la thams cad shes pa nyid kyis phan gdags
233a7('bum): par bya ba de dag la ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs so/ /sems can gang la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs
233a8('bum): so/ /sems can gang la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs so/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom
233b1('bum): ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas sems can rnams la sman 'dogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
233b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la skom/ gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la gzhon pa/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba/ spos
233b3('bum): 'dod pa rnams la spos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la gos/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha/ gnas 'dod pa rnams la gnas/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / be dur+ya dang /
233b4('bum): dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul gyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba nas/
233b5('bum): myi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du yongs su gtong ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dbul zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / ji ltar rang sangs rgyas rnams
233b6('bum): dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la yongs
233b7('bum): su gtong ba de bzhin du/ myir gyur pa rnams dang / de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la yang tha dad du bya ba myed pa'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong
233b8('bum): ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni tha dad du bya ba myed pa ste/ des tha dad du bya ba myed pa'i sbyin pa byin pas/ tha dad du bya ba myed pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
234a1('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags sbyin pa'i gnas ma yin pa mthong nas/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gi
234a2('bum): sbyin gnas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/ byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa ma yin no snyam na/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
234a3('bum): dpa' chen pos ni byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'di ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag la ni sbyin pas phan gdags par bya'o/ /'di dag la ni phan gdags par myi bya'o/ /zhes bya bar bla na myed pa yang dag
234a4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ma yin te/ de dag sbyin pas phan btags nas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho
234a5('bum): ba'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te/ sbyin pa de nyid kyis phan btags pa de dag theg pa gsum rim gyis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro/ /gal te byang chub
234a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis gsad par gsol ba btab na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin no snyam 'am/ myi sbyin no snyam pa'i sems
234a7('bum): gzhan bskyed par myi bya'i/ 'khrug pa myed pa'i sems kyis skye bo'i tshogs de dag la sbyin par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni sems can thams cad kyi don tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
234a8('bum): chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir/ gal te rnam par rtog na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa
234b1('bum): rnams dang / slob pa rnams dang / lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten kyis smad par 'gyur te/ de la thog mar sems can thams cad kyi mgon gyis shig ce 'am/ gnas dang / skyabs dang /
234b2('bum): dpung gnyen gyis shig ces sus gsol ba btab btab ces smad par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du myir gyur pa 'am/ myi ma yin par gyur pa
234b3('bum): dag 'ongs nas/ bdag ni slongs mo pa'o zhes yan lag dang / nying lag gcad par gsol ba btab na/ de'i tshe des sbyin nam myi sbyin snyam pa'i sems gnyis su bskyed par myi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
234b4('bum): de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can rnams kyi don tu ched du bsams te/ lus 'dis bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don tu bya'o zhes lus yongs su bzung bas na/
234b5('bum): des 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can 'di dag gi don tu lus yongs su gzung gzung bas de dag bslang myi dgos pas khyer zhing dengs shig ces sems bskyed par byas te/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub
234b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos slongs mo pa mthong na 'di snyam du chos 'di
234b7('bum): dag thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmyigs su myed na/ 'di la su zhig ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong / su la ni sbyin par bya/ ci zhig ni sbyin par bya zhes sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos de dag ni
234b8('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ste/ stong pa nyid la ni gang la yang yongs su gtong ba 'am/ gang las kyang 'phrogs pa myed do/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
235a1('bum): tu phyin pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas
235a2('bum): stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams
235a3('bum): cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /
235a4('bum): de stong pa nyid de dag la gnas shing / sbyin pa gtong na/ de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa des/ phyi dang nang gi
235a5('bum): chos la bcad cing gtubs kyang / bdag la su yang gtub pa 'am/ gcod do bsnyam pa'i sems myi 'byung ngo // //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ rab 'byor ngas
235a6('bum): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsam
235a7('bum): te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu song zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho
235a8('bum): 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag gi bar byas te/
235b1('bum): yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang /
235b2('bum): btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po
235b3('bum): de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang myi dag dang skal pa mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal
235b4('bum): mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo / /rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems
235b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho
235b6('bum): 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/
235b7('bum): yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po
235b8('bum): dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen
236a1('bum): po de dag nas/ rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas/ rnam par langs nas/ lha dang myi dag dang skal pa mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum
236a2('bum): gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo / /rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
236a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsam te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu song zhing sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /
236a4('bum): yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis
236a5('bum): sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
236a6('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
236a7('bum): de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang myi dag dang skal pa
236a8('bum): mnyam par skyes shing rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo / /rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi
236b1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug
236b2('bum): bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la

236b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub
236b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas/ rnam par langs
236b6('bum): nas/ lha dang myi dag dang skal pa mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo / /rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par
236b7('bum): gzigs na/ byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen
236b8('bum): po dag du dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum

241b6('bum): dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing / bzung nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang chud myi gzon to/ /rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas
241b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i
241b8('bum): sems can rnams kyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nying lag gcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song
242a1('bum): gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag
242a2('bum): byams pa thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas lha dang / myi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag
242a3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
242a4('bum): theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
242a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/ /rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig
242a6('bum): rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag /byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don tu bdag yongs su
242a7('bum): gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang / nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub
242a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag byams pa thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par
242b1('bum): langs nas lha dang / myi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan
242b2('bum): 'das de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das
242b3('bum): pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag
242b4('bum): ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/ /rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
242b5('bum): chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang / nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor
242b6('bum): ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag

243a6('bum): skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan
243a7('bum): byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
243a8('bum): mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/ /rab 'byor ngas
243b1('bum): yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can

245a2('bum): lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
245a3('bum): skyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/ /rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
245a4('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

245a6('bum): gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag byams pa thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas
245a7('bum): lha dang myi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
245a8('bum): de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg
245b1('bum): pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
245b2('bum): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o/ /rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten
245b3('bum): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
245b4('bum): dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang / nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
245b5('bum): de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang de dag byams pa thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas lha dang myi'i
245b6('bum): nang du skye ba dang / de dag du skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos
245b7('bum): thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
245b8('bum): dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
246a1('bum): cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni/ de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcwo lnga pa/ rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs
246a2('bum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags
246a3('bum): kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dags kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
246a4('bum): po de la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang /
246a5('bum): myi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /
246a6('bum): rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
246a7('bum): chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems
246a8('bum): can yi dags kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas/ rnam par
246b1('bum): langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / myi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
246b2('bum): nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems
246b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi
246b4('bum): dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge
246b5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / myi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nam yang
246b6('bum): 'bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan kyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa'
246b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi
246b8('bum): dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas/ rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas
247a1('bum): de dag nas/ rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / myi'i 'jig rten tu skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs
247a2('bum): su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar kyi
247a3('bum): phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa
247a4('bum): de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dags kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi
247a5('bum): dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / myi'i 'jig rten tu skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i
247a6('bum): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
247a7('bum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams
247a8('bum): kyi yi dags kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dags kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems
247b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis
247b2('bum): lha'i 'jig rten dang / myi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur
247b3('bum): ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa'
247b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dags kyi
247b5('bum): yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas/ rnam par langs nas/
247b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / myi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /
247b7('bum): nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
247b8('bum): dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul pa de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir
248a1('bum): chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dags kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba
248a2('bum): dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / myi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan
248a3('bum): las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/
248a4('bum): 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed
248a5('bum): cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dags kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing /
248a6('bum): yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas/ rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas/ rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / myi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/
248a7('bum): phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs
248a8('bum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dags
248b1('bum): kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dags kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing / ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dags kyi yul pa de dag
248b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas/ rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dags kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
248b3('bum): de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / myi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nam yang
248b4('bum): 'bral bar myi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo / /rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub
248b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
248b6('bum): byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang /
248b7('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal myed khang de dag 'bar bar
248b8('bum): snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag myed pa/
249a1('bum): 'du byed thams cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du myi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid
249a2('bum): phebs par gnas shes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang
249a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
249a4('bum): kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su
249a5('bum): mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag las/ gzhal myed khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar

249a8('bum): ston to/ /rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa'

249b7('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang /

250a1('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la/ gzhal myed khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing de dag skyo
250a2('bum): bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag myed pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid

250b5('bum): ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal myed khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas
