250b7('bum): ni yid brtan du myi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis

251a4('bum): thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag myed pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du myi rung ba 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par

251a8('bum): gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas
251b1('bum): cher myos pa de dag la gzhal myed khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba/

251b7('bum): grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag myed pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du myi rung ba/

252a1('bum): gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
252a2('bum): dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de
252a3('bum): thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang
252a4('bum): 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal myed khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du
252a5('bum): byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag myed pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du myi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/
252a6('bum): 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to/ /rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
252a7('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/
252a8('bum): chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
252b1('bum): rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab
252b2('bum): 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
252b3('bum): rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig
252b4('bum): lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston
252b5('bum): to/ /rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs
252b6('bum): na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs
252b7('bum): po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang
252b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
253a1('bum): kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub
253a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba bskyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang /

255b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gnyis kyis sems can rnams sdud de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa'o/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
255b6('bum): dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gser ram/ dngul lam/
255b7('bum): nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ be dur+ya 'am/ dung ngam/ man shel lam/ byu ru 'am/ sa le sbram 'am/ zas sam/ skom 'am/ gdugs sam/ gos sam/ spos sam/ 'phreng ba 'am/
255b8('bum): byug pa 'am/ mal cha 'am/ stan nam/ 'tsho ba 'am/ bud myed dam/ skyes pa 'am/ rta 'am/ glang po 'am/ bdag po yongs su gtong na/ 'di skad du kye sems can dag tshur sheg /bdag nyid kyi dang 'dra
256a1('bum): bar bslang myi dgos par khyer cig / long la deng shig ces brjod de/ sbyin pa des sbyin pa byin nas/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su gtong ngo / /chos la skyabs su gtong ngo / /dge 'dun la skyabs su gtong ngo / /la
256a2('bum): la ni bslab pa'i gnas lnga la 'dzin tu 'dzud do/ /la la ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i nye bar gnas pa la nye bar gnas par byed do/ /la la ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god do/ /la la ni bsam
256a3('bum): gtan dang po la 'god do/ /la la ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la 'god do/ /la la ni bsam gtan gsum pa la 'god do/ /la la ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god do/ /la la ni byams pa la 'god do/ /la la ni snying
256a4('bum): rje la 'god do/ /la la ni dga' ba la 'god do/ /la la ni btang snyoms la 'god do/ /la la ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do/ /la la ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do/ /la la ni chung zad
256a5('bum): myed pa'i skye mched la 'god do/ /la la ni 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la 'god do/ /la la ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni chos rjes su dran pa la yang dag par
256a6('bum): skul lo/ /la la ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni
256a7('bum): lha rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni lus la myi gtsang ba las stsogs pa'i 'du shes su so sor brtag pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni rnam par dag pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /
256a8('bum): la la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni
256b1('bum): dbang po lnga la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni stobs lnga la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
256b2('bum): la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni

256b5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su grub par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag

256b7('bum): la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni rang byang chub la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo/ /la la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
256b8('bum): nyid la yang dag par skul lo/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongs su gtang zhing
257a1('bum): thabs mkhas pas bla na myed pa'i bde ba dang ldan par 'god de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang
257a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor gnyis po 'di dag ni chos kyi sbyin pa ste/
257a3('bum): 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang / ma nor bar bstan pa ste/ 'di ltar
257a4('bum): myi gtsang ba'i rnam pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten
257a5('bum): pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang / thun mong du gyur pa rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'jig rten kyi
257a6('bum): chos kyi sbyin pa de btang nas/ rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten kyi chos ma nor bar blangs pa de las bskyod nas/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag
257a7('bum): la rab tu 'god do/ /de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang / 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i chos shes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par
257a8('bum): spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /

257b2('bum): bcom pa nyid de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes
257b3('bum): pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid shes pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/ /bsam
257b4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /chen po stong
257b5('bum): pa nyid shes pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
257b6('bum): nyid shes pa'o/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /dngos
257b7('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul
257b8('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi shes pa'o/ /dbang po lnga shes pa'o/ /stobs lnga shes pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun shes pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes pa'o/ /
258a1('bum): bsam gtan bzhi shes pa'o/ /tshad myed pa bzhi shes pa'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad shes pa'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
258a2('bum): par 'jug pa dgu shes pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa shes pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams shes pa'o/ /gzugs
258a3('bum): kyi sgo rnams shes pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes pa'o/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi shes pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes pa'o/ /
258a4('bum): byams pa chen po shes pa'o/ /snying rje chen po shes pa'o/ /dga' ba chen po shes pa'o/ /btang snyoms chen po shes pa'o/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang /
258a5('bum): zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma gtogs par/ de dag byang chub
258a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
258a7('bum): ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan
258a8('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
258b1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub
258b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan
258b3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye brag yod do/ /gsol pa/ bye brag ji lta bu zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
258b4('bum): nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes brnyes pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnas shing / chos thams cad mun pa myed pa thob pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyang
258b5('bum): gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed do/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i
258b6('bum): chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ de la brten pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i
258b7('bum): chos kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'god pa yin no/ /rab 'byor byang
258b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang
259a1('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum
259a2('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
259a3('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin
259a4('bum): kyi sgo rnams te/ 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi
259a5('bum): rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta
259a6('bum): zhing rnam par spyad do/ /lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la kun 'byung ba dang / zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la myi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig
259a7('bum): rten du gang yang nye bar len pa myed do/ /nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig
259a8('bum): rten gyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /tshor ba la kun tu 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyad do/ /tshor ba la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par
259b1('bum): spyod do/ /tshor ba la kun 'byung ba dang / zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /tshor ba la myi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa myed do/ /nang gi sems dang / phyi'i
259b2('bum): sems dang / phyi'i nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing
259b3('bum): rnam par spyod do/ /sems la kun tu 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing / rnam par spyad do/ /sems la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /sems la kun 'byung ba dang / zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par
259b4('bum): spyod do/ /sems la myi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa myed do/ /nang gi chos dang / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus
259b5('bum): can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyad
259b6('bum): do/ /chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la kun 'byung ba dang / zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la myi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa
259b7('bum): myed do/ /rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams myi skyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes
259b8('bum): pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa skyed cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang / bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa'o/ /rab 'byor
260a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
260a2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang
260a3('bum): po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o/ /stobs lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang /
260a4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs te/ de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran
260a5('bum): pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
260a6('bum): shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes
260a7('bum): bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /
260a8('bum): yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o/ /de la
260b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben
260b2('bum): pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/
260b3('bum): de ni mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ myi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
260b4('bum): ces bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams
260b5('bum): mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa
260b6('bum): bzhi pa'o/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa
260b7('bum): drug pa'o/ /'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni
260b8('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di la la la 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos
261a1('bum): kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par
261a2('bum): rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su ste/ sems kyi rgyud cig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa myed pa dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can
261a3('bum): bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong
261a4('bum): la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
261a5('bum): de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal ba yang myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa/
261a6('bum): bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs
261a7('bum): kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
261a8('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye
261b1('bum): mched las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par
261b2('bum): 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor
261b3('bum): ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas te/ 'di ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o/ /de la mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/ mtha' dag sa dang / mtha' dag chu dang /
261b4('bum): mtha' dag mye dang / mtha' dag rlung dang / mtha' dag sngon po dang / mtha' dag ser po dang / mtha' dag dmar po dang / mtha' dag dkar po dang / mtha' dag rnam par shes pa dang / mtha' dag nam
261b5('bum): mkha' ste/ de dag ni mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o/ /de la zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ nang gzugs su 'du shes shing / phyi rol kyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug
261b6('bum): pa dang / kha dog myi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes/ zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o/ /nang gzugs su
261b7('bum): 'du shes shing phyi rol kyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog myi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil kyis
261b8('bum): gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o/ /nang gzugs myed par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog myi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te
262a1('bum): shes zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o/ /nang gzugs myed par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog
262a2('bum): myi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o/ /nang gzugs
262a3('bum): myed par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon por snang ba/ mdog sngon po 'di lta ste/ dper na me tog o ma ka lta bu 'am/ yul ba ra na ser byas pa'i gos ltar
262a4('bum): sngo ba/ kha dog sngo ba/ sngo bar snang ba/ mdog sngo bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te/ shes zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched
262a5('bum): lnga pa'o/ /nang gzugs myed par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser por snang ba/ mdog ser po 'di lta ste/ dper na shing kar shi ka ri'i me tog lta bu 'am/ yul ba ra na ser
262a6('bum): byas pa'i gos ltar ser ba/ kha dog ser ba/ ser bar snang ba/ mdog ser bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes/ zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o/ /nang gzugs
262a7('bum): myed par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar por snang ba/ mdog dmar po 'di lta ste/ dper na man du dzi ba ka'i me tog lta bu 'am/ yul ba ra na ser byas pa'i gos
262a8('bum): ltar dmar ba/ kha dog dmar ba dmar bar snang ba mdog dmar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil kyis gnon pa'i
262b1('bum): skye mched bdun pa'o/ /nang gzugs myed par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po/ kha dog dkar po dkar por snang ba/ mdog dkar po 'di lta ste/ dper na skar ma pa ba sangs kyi 'od lta bu 'am/
262b2('bum): yul ba ra na ser byas pa'i gos ltar dkar ba/ kha dog dkar ba dkar bar snang ba/ mdog dkar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil kyis
262b3('bum): gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o/ /de la nyon mongs pa myed pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa/ sems can pha rol dang / gang
262b4('bum): zag pha rol kyi nyon mongs pa myi skye ba'i mthu yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang gis 'grub pa de ni nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes bya'o/ /smon lam gyi shes pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas te/ 'di shes par
262b5('bum): bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi shes pa 'am/ shes pa gang dang gang 'dod par gyur pa de la yid kyis smon pa byed de/ de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas de'i smon
262b6('bum): lam de yongs su grub par gyur cig / shes bya de yang shes pa de ni smon lam gyi shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i myig gi
262b7('bum): mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa'i
262b8('bum): mngon par shes pa ste/ drug po de dag go/ /de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / dmyigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/
263a1('bum): bzhi po de dag go/ /de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang
263a2('bum): ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / bcu po de dag go/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ rab
263a3('bum): 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
263a4('bum): mkhyen to/ /'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / las yongs su blangs pa'i rnam par smyin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /khams sna tshogs can dang khams
263a5('bum): du ma can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyis mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen
263a6('bum): to/ /sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
263a7('bum): rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
263a8('bum): rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ tshe rabs brgya dang /
263b1('bum): tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar du yang rjes su dgongs so/ /bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ bskal pa brgya'i bar dang /
263b2('bum): bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma'i bar dag kyang rjes su dgongs te/ bdag ni
263b3('bum): 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go/ /mying ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/ /zas ni 'di za za'o/ /yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas so/ /
263b4('bum): tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig du gyur te/ bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig du skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/ sa
263b5('bum): mal dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs so/ /lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dag
263b6('bum): kyang gzigs so/ /kha dog sdug pa dang / myi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang ngan pa dang / bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang / ngan song na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dong ba'i sems
263b7('bum): can rnams rab tu mkhyen te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa
263b8('bum): 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o/ /sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs
264a1('bum): par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa/ myi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu
264a2('bum): de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to/ /zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par
264a3('bum): grol ba dang / zag pa myed pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag
264a4('bum): gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs
264a5('bum): pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/
264a6('bum): bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs par thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor kyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go/ /
264a7('bum): tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor
264a8('bum): bar bya'o/ /bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa
264b1('bum): 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su 'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/
264b2('bum): de la bdag bde ba 'thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs par thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor kyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ /
264b3('bum): tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis rab tu
264b4('bum): bskor bar bya'o/ /gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bsten pa de dag la bsten na/ bar chad kyi chos su myi 'gyur ro/ /zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs
264b5('bum): pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/
264b6('bum): de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor kyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag
264b7('bum): go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis rab
264b8('bum): tu bskor bar bya'o/ /gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na/ sdug bsngal yang
265a1('bum): dag par zad par myi 'byung ngo zhes/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes
265a2('bum): bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/
265a3('bum): khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor kyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/
265a4('bum): gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag ni myi 'jigs pa'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag
265a5('bum): par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par
265a6('bum): rig pa ste/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ don la dmyigs pa dang / chos la dmyigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la dmyigs pa dang / spobs pa la dmyigs pa'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs
265a7('bum): pa'i bsrung ba myed pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/
265a8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa myi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la myi mnga' ste/ 'di ni
265b1('bum): bsrung ba myed pa dang po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa myi mnga' bas/ la las
265b2('bum): shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la myi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba myed pa gnyis pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan
265b3('bum): pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa myi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la myi mnga' ste/ 'di ni
265b4('bum): bsrung ba myed pa gsum pa'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe/ la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing / bka'
265b5('bum): mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed na/ yang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par myi 'gyur/ yid bde bar myi 'gyur/ thugs yeng
265b6('bum): yeng por myi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o/ /la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing / bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos
265b7('bum): la nan tan du myi byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa thugs khro bar myi 'gyur/ myi bzod par myi 'gyur/ thugs myi ches par myi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis
265b8('bum): pa'o/ /la la ni rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog la/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed/ la la ni rna ba btud de rim gror myi nyan cing / bka'
266a1('bum): mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa myed de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du myi byed kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa 'am/ thugs khro ba gnyis su myi 'gyur te/ thams
266a2('bum): cad du dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa myed pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/
266a3('bum): gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las myi 'da' ba ste/ de ni nyams pa myed pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o/ /
266a4('bum): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang de dag la lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/ de bzhin
266a5('bum): gshegs pa la ni de lta bu yang myi 'da' ste/ de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje
266a6('bum): chen po gang dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten kyi brda' nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa mdzad ces
266a7('bum): bya ste/ dngos su na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po/ sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smyin par bya ba gzigs pa rtag par 'byung ste/ de ni thugs rje chen
266a8('bum): po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa myi mnga'o/ /ca co myi mnga'o/ /dgongs pa
266b1('bum): nyams pa myi mnga'o/ /'du shes sna tshogs myi mnga'o/ /thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa myi mnga'o/ /ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms myi mnga'o/ /mos pa yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o/ /brtson 'grus
266b2('bum): yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o/ /dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o/ /shes rab yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba yongs su
266b3('bum): nyams pa myi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o/ /sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /gsung
266b4('bum): gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /'das pa'i
266b5('bum): dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma
266b6('bum): chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang
266b7('bum): zhe na/ gang la dmyigs pa myed pa dran pas dbang bsgyur ba/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid myed pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs
266b8('bum): pa'i myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba dang / phyag dang zhabs
267a1('bum): gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting ba yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang / zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen tu
267a2('bum): 'khyil ba dang / ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / phyag brla dang por slebs pa dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang / gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang / spu re re nas
267a3('bum): g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang / phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang / shing
267a4('bum): n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin tu yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang / tshems mnyam pa
267a5('bum): dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi
267a6('bum): mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/ rus pa 'am ba so la gzugs bkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas phyag
267a7('bum): dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o/ /zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs zhum pa myed pas/ zhabs shin tu gnas pa'o/ /ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang
267a8('bum): zhabs kyi sor mo' dra bar 'brel bas phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa'o/ /shing bal gyi ye'u ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o/ /phyag dang zhabs
267b1('bum): dang mgur gyi lhun shin tu mtho bas bdun shin tu mtho ba'o/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas sor mo ring ba'o/ /rting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa'o/ /sku lag pa mdun du 'phags la drang bas sku
267b2('bum): che zhing drang ba'o/ /pus mo'i lha nga dang / long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs legs par mtho ba'o/ /spu gyen tu g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas/ yan lag gi spu gyen tu 'khyil pa'o/ /ri dgas e
267b3('bum): ne ya'i byin pa dang / smyig ma dang zlum bu dar ba ltar drang zhing ma nyams la rim gyis gzhol bar grub cing / byin pa zlum pas ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu'o/ /brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud
267b4('bum): kyang / phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo'i lha nga la reg pas/ phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o/ /glang po dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas/ gsang
267b5('bum): ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o/ /shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog go/ /gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog tu 'dug la/
267b6('bum): sku la rdul myi 'go bas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o/ /shin tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re rer skyes shing gnyis su myed pas/ spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa'o/ /me tog kun da dang zla ba dang /
267b7('bum): 'o ma dang / ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la/ nyi ma dang zla ba brgya las kyang 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smyin mtshams shin tu brgyan pas/ zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'o/ /ro stod che bas
267b8('bum): seng ge'i ro stod do/ /mgur dang rgyud legs par 'brel cing lhun zlum pas/ phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o/ /gser gyi gtan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas
268a1('bum): phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o/ /rlung dang / khris pa dang / bad kan gyis ma nyams shing rnam par shes pa 'dra ba myed pas/ ro bro ba'i mchog go/ /sku chu zheng mdom gang du mnyam pas shing n+ya
268a2('bum): gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa'o/ /spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang ldan pa'i dbu mnyam zhing legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o/ /
268a3('bum): me tog ud pa la dmar po'i mdab ma'i kha dog lta bur 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o/ /tshangs pa dang bya ka la ping ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs
268a4('bum): so/ /'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te/ yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o/ /me tog kun da dang dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i
268a5('bum): tshems mnga' bas tshems shin tu dkar ba'o/ /tshems la mtho dman myed pas tshems mnyam pa'o/ /tshems la mtshams ma dod pas tshems thags bzang ba'o/ /bla 'og dgyes dgu myed pas
268a6('bum): tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o/ /dkar nag gi cha ma 'dres la shin tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pos ma yog pas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'o/ /rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma
268a7('bum): 'dzings pas ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o/ /de la bla ma'i bsu bskyal dang / chos mnyan pa la sdod pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten rjes su bsgrub pa la stsogs pa la phu dud du byas pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor
268a8('bum): lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so/ /yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/ de ni myi g.yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltas so/ /sbyin pa dang / ngag snyan pa
268b1('bum): dang / don spyad dang / don 'thun pa'i bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms par byas pas phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa ste/ de ni myur tu 'du ba'i snga ltas so/ /bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba zhim
268b2('bum): zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang bdun shin tu mtho ba ste/ de gnyis ni bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba thob pa'i snga ltas so/ /bcings
268b3('bum): pa bkrol ba dang srog gi rim gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pas sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba ste/ de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so/ /dge ba'i chos yang dag
268b4('bum): par blangs pa dang / bzung ba dang mngon par spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen tu 'khyil pa ste/ de ni myi nyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga
268b5('bum): ltas so/ /rig pa dang bzo'i las rim gror byas shing gzhan byin pa dang / bdag gis blangs pas ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/ de ni myur tu 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so/ /
268b6('bum): bdog cing yod pa'i nor la bslangs na myi 'god par gtong zhing myed ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang por slebs pa ste/ de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang dul ba'i snga ltas so/ /grogs po dang mdza' bshes
268b7('bum): dang gnyen pa phye ba dang / bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs bas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su
268b8('bum): nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang po'i snga ltas so/ /stan dang gos dang / khang pa dang / gzhal myed khang dang gnas bzang po byin pas gser kyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis
269a1('bum): ni gdan dang / na bza' dang / khang pa dang / gzhal myed khang dang / gnas bzang po thob pa'i snga ltas so/ /'du 'dzi spangs pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / pha ma dang phu nu la
269a2('bum): stsogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gror byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang / bcol ba rna la ma gzan pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/
269a3('bum): de ni mnyam pa myed pa'i snga ltas so/ /myi snyan par myi zer zhing myi smod la snyan par smra zhing / legs par bshad pa 'thun par 'dzin pas seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub
269a4('bum): ste/ de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so/ /na ba rnams la rtsi dang / rim gro dang / sman dang nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang / rim gro byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog ste/
269a5('bum): de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so/ /skyed mos tshal dang / 'khor dang / btung ba dang / rdzing bu dang / rgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang / kha zas dang / 'phreng ba'i gnas dang / stegs dang / gtsug lag khang bya ba la
269a6('bum): stsogs pa la gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing / bdag gis gzhan byin pas shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni mnga' ba chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/ /yun ring por tshig
269a7('bum): snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde bar smras pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/ /gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan
269a8('bum): pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing / rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyan na dga' zhing myi 'thun pa myed pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang / btang myi bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o/ /
269b1('bum): yun ring po nas tshig kyal ba spangs shing dus su smra smra bas/ seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig kun kyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so/ /rim gror bya ba dang brnyas pa myed pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas/ tshems
269b2('bum): shin tu dkar ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de ni 'khor snga nas bstsags pa'i snga ltas so/ /yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma myed pa'i tshems smra smra bas tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba
269b3('bum): ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer myi phyed pa'i snga ltas so/ /pang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa myed la/ ma chags myi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa myed pa'i myig gis lta lta bas/ myig spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang /
269b4('bum): ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so/ /rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe
269b5('bum): na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen bshes byams
269b6('bum): pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rig dang rgyud mthon por 'byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho ba yin/ sangs rgyas
269b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul la kha na ma tho ba myi mnga' ba ste/ sor mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas
269b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang / gsung dang sku'i 'phrin las dang / 'tsho ba shin tu
270a1('bum): dben pa ste/ rtsa myi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grel pa ste/ rtsa la mdud pa myed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dben
270a2('bum): pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/ long bu myi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myi mnyam pa thams cad las sgrol ba ste/ zhabs myi mnyam pa myed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
270a3('bum): myi'i seng ge ste/ seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myi'i glang po ste/ glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar
270a4('bum): nam mkha' las bzhud pa ste/ ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myi'i khyu mchog ste/ khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
270a5('bum): ni 'thun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni blta na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po
270a6('bum): myi mnga' ba ste/ ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/ sku shin tu legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i
270a7('bum): chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pa ste/ sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku
270a8('bum): dang gsung thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
270b1('bum): 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dpe' byad shin tu
270b2('bum): rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste/ sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i
270b3('bum): thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/ kun shin tu gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
270b4('bum): rtag tu zhum pa myed pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku zhum pa myed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/ sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
270b5('bum): rnams ni yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ sku shin tu 'khrugs pa myed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / nying lag legs par ston pa ste/
270b6('bum): yan lag dang nying lag spa bar mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ snang ba rab rib myed cing / rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
270b7('bum): rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ phyal zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs
270b8('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhol pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zag pa rnam par bzlog pa ste/ phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
271a1('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste/ lte ba zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'thun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil
271a2('bum): ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin tu gtsang ba dang ldan pa
271a3('bum): ste/ kun spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/ sku la smye ba myed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
271a4('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar yang ba rab tu thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/ phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang /
271a5('bum): skye bo phal la byams pas dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi
271a6('bum): ri mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i
271a7('bum): gnas ha cang yang myi ring bar 'cha' ba ste/ zhal ha cang myi ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan 'jig rten thams cad du bkye ba ste/ zhal gzugs kyi
271a8('bum): gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du btang zhing 'dul ba ste/ ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
271b1('bum): rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin tu srab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo 'dod chags rnams kyi chos dang 'dul ba gting
271b2('bum): dpag dka' ba ste/ ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa myi mnga' ba ste/ glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs
271b3('bum): dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan
271b4('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/
271b5('bum): tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
271b6('bum): rnams ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/ tshems
271b7('bum): mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
271b8('bum): 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/ shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/ spyan
272a1('bum): ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ spyan rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
272a2('bum): rnams ni sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bstsags pa ste/ rdzi ma stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang / skyes bu dang / na chung mchog gi myig
272a3('bum): dkar nag 'byes shing pad mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba ste/ spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
272a4('bum): 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/ smyin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/ smyin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs
272a5('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ smyin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems
272a6('bum): snum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ smyin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste/ snyan legs
272a7('bum): shing snyan shal ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ snyan mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems
272a8('bum): can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/ snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/
272b1('bum): zhal 'phral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phas kyis rgol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/
272b2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung ba rnam par bzlog pa ste/
272b3('bum): dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ dbu stug pa yin/ sangs
272b4('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/ dbu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs
272b5('bum): pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ dbu myi 'dzing ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste/ dbu myi rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas
272b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me tog gis skye bo 'thun par bsgrubs pa ste/ dbu dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
272b7('bum): rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang / bkra shis dang / dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin/ rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
272b8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
273a1('bum): kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ rab
273a2('bum): 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
273a3('bum): bam po bcu bdun pa/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
273a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
273a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang
273a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus
273a7('bum): pa myed de/ rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
273a8('bum): chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do/ /
273b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed de/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas
273b2('bum): sems can rnams sdud do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
273b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma
273b4('bum): 'dus pa myed de/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud do/ /rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
273b5('bum): rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
273b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad du 'doms shing 'di skad ston to/ /rigs kyi bu khyed tshur sheg /yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis
273b7('bum): shig / yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig /yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis shig /yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad
273b8('bum): shes par gyis shig / yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig /yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis
274a1('bum): shig / yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig /yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgoms shig ces ston to/ /rab 'byor byang chub
274a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus
274a3('bum): par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya na/ la la
274a4('bum): goms shing yi ge myed pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
274a5('bum): chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ de la chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge mang pos yi ge myed pa'i chos ston kyang / rab
274a6('bum): 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang 'bral ba yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos te/
274a7('bum): gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
274a8('bum): gal te mtha' las 'das pa dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can yang shin tu myi dmyigs/ chos kyang myi dmyigs/ chos kyi dngos po yang myi
274b1('bum): dmyigs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
274b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
274b3('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa myed
274b4('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
274b5('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod cing / rnam
274b6('bum): par smyin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/ de la ni sems can myi dmyigs te/ sems can du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /sems
274b7('bum): can myi dmyigs pas gzugs dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can myi dmyigs pas tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can myi dmyigs pas 'du shes dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /sems
274b8('bum): can myi dmyigs pas 'du byed dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can myi dmyigs pas rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can myi dmyigs pas myig dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /
275a1('bum): sems can myi dmyigs pas rna ba dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can myi dmyigs pas sna dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can myi dmyigs pas lce dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can
275a2('bum): myi dmyigs pas rna ba dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can myi dmyigs pas lus dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can myi dmyigs pas yid dmyigs
275a3('bum): su ma mchis so/ /sems can myi dmyigs pas gzugs dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can myi dmyigs pas sgra dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /
275a4('bum): sems can myi dmyigs pas dri dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can myi dmyigs pas ro dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can myi dmyigs pas
275a5('bum): reg dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can myi dmyigs pas chos dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can myi dmyigs pas myig gi rnam par shes pa dmyigs
275a6('bum): su ma mchis so/ /sems can myi dmyigs pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can myi dmyigs pas sna'i rnam par shes pa

281a1('bum): sems/ sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
281a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de dag phyin ci log rnams las yongs su bkrol nas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul du
281a3('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'du shes ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'du byed ma bcings ma grol
281a4('bum): ba/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ myig ma bcings ma grol ba/ rna ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ sna ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid ma bcings ma grol ba/
281a5('bum): gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ sgra ma bcings ma grol ba/ dri ma bcings ma grol ba/ ro ma bcings ma grol ba/ reg ma bcings ma grol ba/ chos ma bcings ma grol ba/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol
281a6('bum): ba/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid kyi rnam
281a7('bum): par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus
281a8('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma
281b1('bum): grol ba/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol
281b2('bum): ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ sa'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ chu'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ mye'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rlung gi khams ma
281b3('bum): bcings ma grol ba/ nam mkha'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ ma rig pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings
281b4('bum): ma grol ba/ mying dang gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ skye mched drug ma bcings ma grol ba/ reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ sred pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ len pa ma
281b5('bum): bcings ma grol ba/ srid pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ skye ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ rga shi ma bcings ma grol ba/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings
281b6('bum): ma grol ba/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol
281b7('bum): tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ phyi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/
281b8('bum): chen po stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ mtha' las 'das
282a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ chos
282a2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ ngo bo nyid
282a3('bum): stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul
282a4('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ dbang po rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ stobs rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
282a5('bum): lag brgyad pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ bsam gtan rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshad myed pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
282a6('bum): pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa
282a7('bum): dang / smon pa myed pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ de bzhin gshegs

282b3('bum): ma grol ba ste/ gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no/ /'du shes kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin

285b7('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /'du shes ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /'du
